The player can directly control a team of Marine soldiers, or can issue orders to the team from the Mobile Tactical Operations Bay (MTOB). When playing from the MTOB, the player has a view of the team's surroundings via video cameras attached to each soldier's helmet.

name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
summary: Based on the second blockbuster film from 20th Century Fox opening December, 2007, Aliens vs. Predator, is an all-new third-person action game exclusively designed for the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system from the creators of the award-winning original Aliens vs. Predator for PC. You play as an elite, lone Predator, carrying an awesome arsenal of exotic weaponry, stealth tracking and vision mode equipment. Your mission: eradicate all traces of the horrifying Alien menace from the previously sleepy town of Gunnison, Colorado.

name: Alien: Isolation - The Trigger
summary:
Welcome to The Trigger, the fifth add-on content pack for Alien: Isolation.

Can you make Sevastopol safe? You’ve been given a box of explosives and the locations to set them. All you need to do now is pull the trigger… and stay alive.

- Features three all-new Survivor Mode maps. Can you survive and get the highest score?
- Play as Ricardo and learn the truth behind the explosives on board Sevastopol.
- Avoid security alarms, take on Working Joes and above all, survive the Alien.

name: Alone To Melt
summary: You play as an ice cube that melts with every move it makes.

name: Alteration
summary: A narrative experience of psychological horror and metaphysical mystery. Reality bends, time stutters, and something unseen follows your every breath.

name: Alien Cat 2
summary:
In this top-down puzzle game you will help cute black cat to save the universe.
You should collect all spaceship parts on levels and reach the portal. But this is not so easy as it seems. Traps is everywhere. Mines, stakes trap, be careful to avoid all of them. And by the way look carefully for your clones, they can get on trap as well. The clones mimic all Cat movement, but they stop if they stuck on the wall. Avoid mines and enemies, and push the buttons to close the stakes traps.

name: Alphadia III
summary: Alphadia III is a retro-style fantasy RPG set at the times of the Energi War. Join Alfonso, an energi clone, on a quest for truth with deep turn-based battles, SP Skills, Arrays, and the unique Energi Crock system—all in charming pixel art.

name: All Star Fighting
summary:
The craziest heroes and heroines! Who's the toughest? It's time to stop talking and start fighting.

14 unique characters, from bikini-girl to chan-saw boy!
Characters from D3Publisher's games come together for a head-to-head show down. Each has their own unique and distinctive style, it's up to you to master them.

The impact system is key to winning!
Learn your fighter's combos and special moves. If your energy is running low, use a super impact attack to turn the tables on your enemy!

Multiple game modes and bonus features!
Play a wide variety of game modes. Including practise mode for trying out new fighters; survival mode for testing your stamina; race against the clock in an attempt to defeat all characters in time attack mode; and more!

name: Alien Xenocide
summary:
Try to survive a nightmare of being alone on an abandoned spaceship full of aliens! Destroy them with grenades, a flame-thrower, a machinegun and make use of teleports and robots... Do everything to make it, to survive!
Finish the aliens off in the one and only way!

Play as 'John' aboard the Spaceship. Fight for your life and find the way to the rescue capsule.

name: Aliens: Infestation
summary:
GAME OVER, MAN! The Xenomorph, the ultimate killing machine, returns. Only the Universe's toughest, the Colonial Marines, can exterminate the galaxy's most feared species. Can you fight off the terror of the alien infestation?

-Choose you squad and watch the dynamic story system adapt
-Pick up where the Aliens crew left off and fight through the U.S.S. Sulaco, planet LV-426, and more!
-Load up with iconic weapons from the film, including pulse rifles, smart guns, and flamethrowers.

name: Alternian Turnabout: Aradia Megido
summary: Homestuck themed Ace Attorney made in Ren'py, with an emphasis on imitation and paying homage to the endearing elements of both series.

name: Alphabet Hero
summary: An RPG Maker MV adventure game in which a warrior gathers alphabets to complete a magical sentence that can save a dead princess.

name: Alien Fish World VR
summary: The galactic cruise ship you're on has been hijacked, the galactic princess has been kidnapped, and you've been shipwrecked on an alien planet. You must rescue the princess and get yourself back home! Learn to catch alien fish to survive, trade with the locals, and find your way back home!

name: Alt254
summary: A minimalistic open-world adventure & action game where... YOU ARE A PIXEL! ■ Embark on a fascinating journey and discover how every pixel will impact your experience in a game with one of the minor resolutions you have ever played!

name: Alchemy Origin
summary: Alchemy: Origins is a classic alchemy game that starts you with 4 basic elements and allows to connect them to create more and more elaborate items - all the way to reaching the stars.

name: All Day Nippon
summary: Bowser has started a mediocre podcast called “All Day Nippon”, so Mario has personally taken it upon himself to put a stop to it!

name: Alive
summary: Alive is a FMV adventure game for the PlayStation developed by General Entertainment.

name: Alchimist: Secret of the Worlds
summary: After decades of peace, an ancient threat returns – forgotten shadows rise once more. As an alchemist you experience an immersive story in the realm of Aethendor, master the art of alchemy, and face ancient dangers in epic battles with magic, melee and ranged combat.

name: Almohadin: Escape from the Basement
summary: Almohadin: escape from the basement is an indie fast-paced 2D precision platformer packed with colorful visuals and bullet hell action. Face a story-rich cartoony adventure inspired by difficult retro side scroller arcade games!

name: Alien Rain
summary: A game based on the Alien movie. Alien Rain (also called Apple Galaxian) is a clone of the arcade game Galaxian. It is a shoot-'em-up where a formation of aliens attack your starfighter at the bottom of the screen. The alien peel off from the group, singly or in formation and attack you, the pattern depending on what type of alien it is. Once all aliens are killed, you move to a new level, indicated by a flag at the bottom. The game was released for the Apple II as Alien Rain.

name: Allen
summary: Allen is a mischievous cat living his best life at the shelter. Your goal? Get adopted, then immediately cause enough chaos to get yourself returned. Knock things over, avoid affection, collect treats, and speedrun mayhem in this chaotic, anti-pet simulator.

name: Alice's World
summary: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.

name: All that Glitters
summary: All That Glitters is a narrative first person game of about one hour, only available in french as of now. Search a polluted river looking for treasures, discuss with your hallucinations, and find the weapon allowing you to defend yourself against the curse of the Idiot.

name: Alien Field
summary: Totally new, attack! Rogue Like Dot Eat! Psychedelic full throttle! Explode your concentration in 3 minutes and knock out the high score!

name: Alone: Shattered Tribes
summary: An isometric survival RPG without the survival. Collect resources and craft items and weapons. Build a settlement on your island. Hunt in the darkest forests, or slay the undead in the cursed crypts. Explore the islands, unite the shattered tribes, and become a Jarl worthy of the sagas.

name: Aliens Like Milk
summary:
Alex is a cute alien. He likes milk very much, but what a pity – there is no more milk in the fridge! It's time to go in search of cows who will treat Alex with milk. Go towards the new adventures...

In this breathtaking physics puzzle you will use interesting mechanisms to rescue all good cows. Collect stars on your way, they will help you to unlock the new planets.

name: Algoremind
summary: Craft a living AI in this sci-fi pixel art Action RPG. Explore dangerous biomes, fulfill life sim needs, survive against the odds, and gather resources to evolve your creation. Your choices shape its consciousness and unlock one of many endings based on the path you choose.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Collector's Edition Pack
summary:
The Collector's Edition Pack includes: 
 
- Plasma Pulse Rifle - This special rifle fires charged balls of plasma annihilating any enemies caught in its path. 
- Sonic Electronic Ball Breakers - Landing on the floor, this special, high-tech grenade bounces several feet into the air before unleashing a large electrical charge that fries anything in the vicinity. 
- US Colonial Marines Academy firing range - Test your speed and accuracy with any gun in different scenarios & navigate multi-room obstacle courses, set on the U.S.S. Sephora, with enemy and innocent civilians targets.

name: Alice's Wonderland 2: Stolen Souls - Collector's Edition
Along Came A Spider
summary: Along Came A Spider is a 2D platform game. In a world made of silk, you control a small spider trying to find his way back home through twenty dynamic swinging, swaying levels. Your spider will learn amazing new abilities allowing him to catch many more flies along his way. Your fearless spider must also confront his worst nightmares in four special boss levels!

name: Almost There: The Platformer
summary: Sprint between saw blades while dodging homing missiles. Duck under lasers while the floor crumbles beneath you. Almost There was designed specifically for fans of the hardcore platforming genre - you've been warned.

name: All Who Wander
summary: All Who Wander is a traditional roguelike with 30 levels and 10 character classes, inspired by games such as Pixel Dungeon. Fight or evade your enemies, discover powerful items, gain companions, and master over 100 abilities. Explore a randomly-generated environment as you journey through blinding deserts, noxious swamps, gloomy caves, and more. But be careful: the world is unforgiving and death is permanent. Learn from your mistakes to improve your strategy and eventually achieve victory!

name: Alien Market Simulator
summary: Run a market on your space station. Restore and upgrade the station, expand your services, and sell to a variety of alien customers. Experience the challenge of managing a business in space and growing your market

name: Alkurai
summary: Alkurai is a 4 player online co-op fantasy horror game. An infamous Alchemist has murdered the king and seized Alkurai's throne. It is up to you and your party to evade his horrid miscreations and restore the kingdom to what it once was.

name: All That is Left
summary: After the tragic death of her ex-girlfriend Yves, Sera finds herself haunted. As Yves’ presence grows stronger, she begins to manipulate Sera’s thoughts—dragging her deeper into a cycle of guilt and longing, and isolating her from those who still care, including her current girlfriend, Irina.

name: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi
summary: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi is a fantasy adventure game where a sword–wielding Guardian and an arcane Monk must learn to work together to defeat the Void corrupting their home. Explore ruined temples, solve environmental puzzles, rescue spirits, and defeat giant Void monsters!

name: Aleprok
summary: A cooperative survival and strategy game where you explore diverse environments, build and defend your clan town, upgrade weapons and skills, and master magic to survive relentless enemy attacks.

name: Alchemy Quest
summary: Familiar needs HP to survive. Collect crystals while avoiding/destroying enemies. Use abilities to restore HP and to destroy enemies. Enemies are attracted by familiar's light.

name: Alien Grounds
summary: A score-driven arcade FPS built for short, high-intensity runs. Every mission escalates. Mastery beats brute force.

name: Alchemos
summary:
In Alchemos, you'll pilot a Proto-Atomic Shell - an atomic-sized device capable of collecting and combining subatomic particles - to discover the elements. Explore weird and wonderful experimental worlds, and challenge your friends to beat your best times

But beware, the particles you seek may be guarded by the forces of Dark Matter! As the Dark Atoms evolve to defeat you, you'll need to upgrade your Proto-Atomic Shell: dash and jump to safety, traverse quantum tunnels, emit particles to freeze your foes, or even annihilate them completely

name: Alias 'The Magpie'
summary: Alias 'The Magpie' is a parser interactive fiction game, or text adventure. There are no graphics! You play as Sir Rodney Playfair, alias the 'Magpie', typing commands to decide what he does next!

name: Aliens versus Predator 2: Primal Hunt
summary:
Aliens Versus Predator 2: Primal Hunt chronicles the initial breach leading up to the events in Aliens Versus Predator 2, specifically, the destruction of Research Pod 5. The story takes place across nine total mission, with three per species (Predator, Predalien, and Corporate). Each of the three playable characters is out to retrieve a mysterious artifact with the power to confuse and repel the Aliens.

New features in the game include the ability to play as a tougher Predator-Alien hybrid in single and multiplayer, a new "energy flechette" weapon for the Predator, and a new 360-degree motion tracker and deployable sentry guns for the humans. Multiplayer includes four new Deathmatch maps and the ability for the Predator to activate a short range self-destruct bomb when nearly defeated.

A copy of the original Aliens Versus Predator 2 is required to play Aliens Versus Predator 2: Primal Hunt.

name: Alice Trapped Beyond Wonderland
summary: Discover and solve the extraordinary mysteries from the magical kingdoms beyond the incredible Wonderland, Find where the evil red queen banished your friends, gather clues about their whereabouts, and solve multiple puzzles to rescue them once and for all to get them back to their home in Wonderland.

name: Alborada
summary: An idle forest game with a rich nature sound library. Discover, collect and customize your forest, set your ideal atmosphere to focus on your tasks or just relax and meditate with the sounds of nature.

name: Alwa's Awakening
summary:
Use your magic staff and progress through a large interconnected world where you'll solve puzzles, fight enemies and defeat bosses in order to help free the land of Alwa. Explore and uncover the secrets by using your platforming skills in this challenging and charming 8-bit adventure game.

Alwa’s Awakening is a game that tries to stay as close as possible to the authentic 8-bit look with sweet pixel art, a soundtrack filled with catchy chiptunes and so much charm it’ll bring you right back to the NES era. With easy to understand controls the game is easy to learn but tough to master, just like how games were in the old days!

- A new challenging NES-inspired adventure game
- Use the magic staff to solve puzzles and defeat enemies
- Find and unlock upgrades to your items and abilities
- Explore a large interconnected map in true 'Metroidvania' style
- Listen to a completely new 8-bit soundtrack with over 25 new original tracks

name: Alternative Alliance Alpha
summary: Alternative Alliance Alpha is a short and gentle sci-fi post-apocalyptic adventure set in the distant future. Take control of the young man Jinovika as you explore the world beyond the colony—gathering resources, meeting new people, and enjoying everyday life in this strange world.

name: Aliens: Dark Descent
summary: Drop into the gripping journey of Aliens: Dark Descent, a squad-based, single-player action game in the iconic Alien franchise. Lead your soldiers in real-time to stop a new and terrifying kind of Xenomorph outbreak on Planet Lethe.

name: Alice in Wonderland: An Adventure Beyond the Mirror
summary: Alice in Wonderland: An Adventure Beyond the Mirror is a puzzle platformer made for the iPhone and Zeebo, released as a tie-in for the 2010 Tim Burton film Alice in Wonderland. It is loosely based on the movie's story, borrowing from its main characters such as Alice, the White Rabbit, the Cheshire Cat, the March Hare, and the Mad Hatter.

name: Alpamys
summary:
The first Kazakh platformer game consisting of three scenes. The hero of the game (Alpamys) fulfills the quests of Baisyn Sultan.
At the end, it is necessary to defeat the Wizard (Final Stage).

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator
summary: Conquer the arcane market in Alchemist Shop Simulator! Set up your very own magical store, full of wonders. Keep expanding your business! Experiment with ingredients bought or home-grown in your garden to brew potions for your quirky clientele. Buy low, sell high, make your store legendary!

name: All Night Nippon Super Mario Bros.
summary: All Night Nippon Super Mario Bros. was a promotional item given out as a contest prize by the Japanese radio show All Night Nippon to celebrate its twentieth year on the air. It is mainly a graphical hack of Super Mario Bros., although a handful of levels are from Super Mario Bros. 2. Some of the games sprites have been changed to look like famous Japanese celebrities and other people related to the All-Night Nippon program.

name: Alien Carnage
summary: Originally released as Halloween Harry, is a side-scrolling platform game developed by Interactive Binary Illusions and SubZero Software, and distributed by Apogee Software. The game features 256-colour VGA graphics and background music in MOD format. Alien Carnage is composed of four episodes. The first episode was released as shareware, and the rest were distributed commercially. In May 2007, John Passfield and 3D Realms released Alien Carnage as freeware. In 2014, the game was re-released with Windows support.

name: Alex's Sketchbook World
summary: The RPG where you win battles by drawing the enemies.

name: Alien Planet
summary: Avoid the aliens and bandits in this skill testing game. Keep your cool as you work your way towards freedom on this planet of relentless enemies. Alien planet uses the simplicity and feel of an 80's style game to create an addictive and challenging experience.

name: Alien Ship Console
summary: Alien Ship Console is an atmospheric puzzle game with arcade elements, where you must navigate mysterious interfaces aboard an alien spacecraft. Explore the buttons and levers, solving unique challenges posed by an unknown alien civilization.

name: Alchemist: Journey of the Soul
summary: First-person adventure game, playable solo or co-op with up to 4 people. Travel through unique areas, uncover memories and use them to craft powerful potions. Unlock special abilities and solve puzzles in a mysterious world. Will your soul survive this journey?

name: Alien Rush
summary: "Alien Rush" is a level - challenging party game integrating platform - hopping and action - solving puzzles. It allows 1 to 4 players to play locally or online. Players can utilize rocket jumps and power hammers to surmount various traps set by the Lime invaders.

name: Alwa's Awakening & Cathedral
summary:
In the Alwa's Awakening and Cathedral cartridge for Evercade, you've got two huge exploration-heavy platform adventures ahead of you. Save the land of Alwa as the video game-loving Zoe in Alwa's Awakening, and discover the truth behind an unnamed knight's identity in the mysterious Cathedral.

Cartridge containing the following 2 games:
- Alwa's Awakening: The 8-bit Edition
- Cathedral

name: Alien Breed: Tower Assault
summary:
In the depths of space a holocaust has occured. Intelligent and hostile alien life-forms have taken over the Military Research Unit in the planet Azarin 2E. Chaos and destruction have been wrought on the innocent colonists.
Now it's your job to reclaim the station for humankind. Travel through the tractless voids of space, then endure over 65 levels of Alien blasting mayhem. Watch your ammunition and energy levels in preparation for the showdown with the Alien Queen.

name: Alice at the End of Her Life
summary: A mysterious disease plagues a world where death shouldn't exist. Fight the nightmares tormenting Wonderland in this 2D turn based RPG inspired by the work of Lewis Carroll. Live forever, dear Alice.

name: All Aboard! The Train Defense Express
summary: Protect the Infinite Power Generator by looping around the train tracks! Battle endless waves of enemies in this unique hybrid of auto-battler, survivor, tower defense, idle/clicker gameplay. How long can you survive?

name: Alien Invaders
summary: Alien Invaders brings you the possibilitie of reviving one of the best and most old videogame experiences in the history, play as a pilot of space shit to defeat the aliens. Play alone or with friends as local coop. And it also prepares you to fight against the aliens instead of crying scared, you can read more about this inside.

name: Alchemy Merge Puzzle Game
summary: Alchemy Merge Puzzle Game is a free addictive game with simple gameplay that combines classic alchemy mechanics with new gameplay elements. It has a unique puzzle game that allows you to mix elements and make new ones.

name: Alien Morgue
summary: Sci-fi pathologist simulator. Identify aliens, detect damages, and perform autopsies to determine the cause of death. Choose to follow protocols or fulfill special requests when handling bodies and their stuff. Your choices may have global consequences.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever
summary: AEW: Fight Forever combines nostalgic arcade-wrestling with All Elite Wrestling finishers and moves. Featuring a big roster of AEW talent, multiple match types, robust career mode, tons of customization options, more than 40 weapons, and so much more!

name: Alara Prime
summary: ALARA Prime is a free-to-play, 4v4v4 competitive tactical first-person shooter. Choose your class, utilize a wide array of gadgets, take advantage of your surroundings, and work together to claim victory. The 3-team format of Transmission mode opens the door to new strategic choices. Teams can backstab, stay focused on the objective, or wait for their moment when the enemy least expects an attack. Pull into the lead and you’ll have to watch your back at every turn.

name: All The Stars
summary: Welcome to All the Stars, a retro-inspired space shooter where thrilling combat meets a cosmic narrative. Face waves of enemies, alien horrors, and a galaxy-changing choice. It’s an amateur passion project but it just might surprise you, no load screens, no microtransactions, just pure arcade action.

name: Alpaca Ball: Allstars
summary:
Alpaca Ball: Allstars is a physics based football game featuring alpacas as players. Instead of using their feet to play the ball, these alpacas play the ball with their heads and oversized necks.

The game features local multiplayer for up to 8 players, and a solo or co-op career mode with a light story in which you travel the world to become the best alpaca ball player to save your home.

name: Alice's Adventures
summary: Alice needs your help unveiling secrets of Wonderland! Colorful 360 degree scenery, animation, and 3D visual effects will make your adventure vivid and fun! Help the heroine solve puzzles and find cleverly disguised clues so she can advance through this wondrous land.

name: Alpha Wave
summary:
Do you have 10-15 minutes to kill? Alpha Wave was made for just such an occasion! A well polished, high-speed, intense arcade space shooter with it's roots firmly planted in the old-school arcade classics such as AstroSmash, Galaga and Asteroids. 
Plenty of non-stop, progressive, survival action with over 65 waves spread across 3 levels featuring a huge variety of different enemies each with their own unique behaviors along with final bosses to bring it all to an explosive finish. 
 
Coupled with amazing special effects, leader boards, 24 achievements to unlock and an amazing musical score, Alpha Wave delivers solid quality for far less than the price of a cup of glorified, high society coffee! 
 
Alpha Wave is fully Android controller ready and compatible with a wide array of HID ready controllers such as nVidia Shield, Xperia Play, Moga Pro, Wikipad, Mad Catz Mojo, Six-Axis and many more! 
 
Also featured in Tegra Zone. Play it on the nVidia Shield or Shield Tablet for an absolutely epic experience!

name: All Under Control
summary:
"He looked weird the entire time."

What was meant to be a visit between two friends in São Paulo takes a turn to the macabre when one of them feels compelled to tell a dark story. Alex, a polar bear in his mid 20s, had moved to the city years ago with hopes for a peaceful future. He had another friend back then: a wolf with dangerous habits, who one day took a step too far...

"All Under Control" is a short furry horror VN inspired by the works of Stephen King, Junji Ito and Thomas Ligotti.

name: Alien Shooter: Revisited
summary: Crowds of blood-thirsty monsters, crawling from every corner of the secret research base. Gloomy basements and modern labs, darkness changing into blazing bulbs. The only usual thing is: you're in a bad place alone, and there's no one to help you! An improved version of a cult 2003 game which won hearts of the huge army of players worldwide. Complete game missions, earning more and more cash for weapons and inventory, use stationary weapons in the hottest places, eliminate monster spawning places with dynamite and increase your firepower with implants and drones.

name: All on Board!: Terraforming Mars
summary:
Get this DLC to host Terraforming Mars sessions in All On Board!

Lead your corporation in the ambitious race to terraform Mars, now adapted for VR in All On Board!

name: A Little Perspective
summary: A Little Perspective is an abstract, perspective-based puzzle game where perception and reality are one and the same.

name: Alien Battlefield
summary: The game includes real-time strategic mode and chess mode. In real-time strategic mode, the units that the game can unlock are related to the player's upgrade route. In the chess mode, units will automatically attack the opponent until the winner is determined.

name: Alaca
summary: Alaca is an action rogue like game with a Top down perspective. While it contains different types of weapons and elements, you must build and master your character by combining them in the most correct way. There is no save point. kill, build character, learn and repeat..

name: A Little Turtle's Big Adventure
summary: A Little Turtle’s intimate journey through the anxiety and excitement of leaving her comfortable home to explore the unknown.

name: Alpha Mission
summary: Alpha Mission is a vertical scrolling shooter that has similarities to Xevious, with the use of air-to-air and air-to-ground weapons.

name: Alaloth: Champions of the Four Kingdoms
summary: Set in a vibrant fantasy world, Alaloth – Champions of The Four Kingdoms offers fast paced action with a deep narrative, developed by a team of industry veterans. The game brings the aRPG dynamics to a new level with a skill based gameplay inspired by great classics such as Moonstone and modern masterpieces as Dark Souls in a gritty, dark, mature environment filled with blood and magic!

name: All on Board!: Escape the Dark Castle
summary: Face traps, monsters, and grim choices in this retro-style cooperative adventure: Escape the Dark Castle, fully adapted for VR on All On Board! Choose your prisoner, roll their unique die, and rely on teamwork to survive. Will your group escape the Dark Castle, or be consumed by the horrors within?

name: Alpacapaca Dash 2
summary: After saving the Alpaca Goddess and vanquishing the eternal darkness, you now have to save the Alpaca World again! Fragments of darkness started appearing and it's your job to destroy them and ensure peace will remain into the colorful Alpaca World.

name: Alpacapaca Dash 1 + 2 Bundle
summary: Alpacapaca Dash 1 + Alpacapaca Dash 2

name: AlleyStrat
summary: For 2019 I ran two prototyping classes – one in Pico-8 for the undergraduates and a graduate version with no platform constraint (which generally means they work in Unity). So this year I hid the same prompt in two different interpretations of the same idea. I tuned the Pico-8 game for the youthful reflexes of the undergraduate class, but I did not count on the fact that none of them would have ever played a bullet-hell game, and as a result, only one of them was able to reach the end and find out what the assignment was. I instructed that person that they could keep it a secret if they wanted to.

name: Alfonzo's Bowling Challenge
summary: Alfonzo is here to teach you a thing or two about bowling.

name: Alien 8
summary:
Alien 8 is an action-adventure video game developed and published by Ultimate Play The Game. It was released for the ZX Spectrum, BBC Micro, Amstrad CPC and MSX in 1985.[a] The game is a spiritual successor to the best-selling Knight Lore, which was lauded by critics for its isometric graphics. In the game, the player takes control of a robot, Alien 8, whose job is to ensure that all of the cryogenically frozen passengers on board a starship remain viable during the ship's voyage.

The game was written by Chris Stamper, and graphics were designed by Tim Stamper. Alien 8 uses the same image masking technique as Knight Lore, which allows the developers to create composite structures out of stacked images without visual overlay. The technique was copyrighted by Ultimate as the Filmation game engine. As with its spiritual predecessor, the game is rendered isometric projection.[2] The game was critically acclaimed upon release. Reviewers praised the game's graphics and innovation, however minor criticism was directed at its similarities to Knight Lore.

name: Al Rocío
summary:
Come to Al Rocío, the first Rocio Brotherhood simulator that lets you travel around Andalusia and visit the Rocio Journey.

Enjoy the experience that is the Rocio Journey, create your own Brotherhood, manage resources, make it grow, gear up and make all your pilgrims arrive at the Almonte village and find the White Dove!

name: Aleste Branch
summary:
Aleste Branch is an upcoming sequel for the Aleste series

Aleste Branch features a gameplay similar to the earlier titles in the series but with various modern touches. The player can choose between three playable ships, each with its own weapons arsenal, with the game utilizing a vertically-oriented screen similar to Senjin Aleste. The ships are equipped with a standard, forward-firing gun which can upgraded and can equip different sub-weapons by picking up their corresponding icons. This time, the sub-weapons can be charged up by holding the shot button, unleashing a powerful attack which can be used only a limited number of times.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Limitless Bunny Pack
summary: Expand your AEW playable roster with The Bunny and Keith Lee and gain access to two brand new minigames: MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Beat the Elite
summary: All new gameplay mode, Beat the Elite, introduces single-player, offline tournament competition to the most competitive Fight Forever players.

name: A Lullaby of Colors
summary: Blissful psychedelic relaxation experience for VR. Fly through breathtakingly beautiful worlds of endless sweet-tasting colors and gentle sounds. Great for relaxing, open-eyed meditation, or jaw-dropping drug-free tripping.

name: Alex Kidd in Pico World
summary: Remember Alex Kidd in Miracle World for the Sega Master System? Now it's crunched down to 64x64 for the Pico-8 Fantasy Console! This miniaturised version of the game features everything from the original game - recreated in the limitations of Pico-8!

name: Alexander
summary: Follow Alexander through the massive worlds, fight enemies using your magical attacks, and explore new places.

name: Alien Highway: Encounter 2
summary:
Highway Encounter is a strategy/action game played from a 3D isometric perspective in which you must successfully chaperone a bomb along a long, straight stretch of highway and into the alien base at the end of it. There are thirty screens to pass through and most are filled with hazards that threaten to block your progress (such as barrels) or destroy you (aliens and explosive mines). 
 
Players control a robotic "Vorton" (resembling a dalek from Doctor Who) and one of the things that provides Highway Encounter with its unique appeal is that the bomb is constantly being pushed onwards by your extra lives - four more Vortons, who accompany you along the highway. A key strategic element to the game is for the player character to travel several screens ahead of the bomb to clear a safe path for it; normally this would be done by temporarily blocking the bomb's forward motion. However, if the bomb is left in an unsafe location, it is possible for all your extra lives to be lost without the player character being destroyed once. Once all spare lives are lost, the player character must manually push the bomb.

name: Alder's Blood
summary: Alder's Blood is a grim, dark and damp turn-based, tactical, strategic, 2D game. Lead a group of Hunters in a world, where nature have lost her mind and repelled the civilisation. Use cold steel and trustworthy rifles or guns to fight back.

name: Alnico Smithery
summary: Alnico Smithery is a hand-drawn, physics-based forging simulator. Mine for ore, smelt ingots, discover alloys, forge tools, and rebuild the smithery your grandfather left behind.

name: Alcatraz: VR Escape Room
summary: "Alcatraz: VR Escape Room" is a story based puzzle game inspired by such classics as Crimson Room. You discover bits and pieces about your life from notes left behind from someone who is trying to help you escape.

name: Alpaca Wonders Why
summary: Alpaca Wonders Why is an interactive adventure for children in the form of a visual novel with a quiz.

name: Alien 3
summary: Alien³ was released after the Alien 3 film. After success on the Super Nintendo and Genesis platforms, the game was built and ported to other systems, including the Commodore 64 and Game Gear. The game is set on the world of the film, Fury 161, but the gameplay has more in common with the film Aliens, throwing wave after wave of enemies at the player.

name: A Long Climb Ago
summary: Build towers, freeze time and climb your way through platforming puzzles to collect crystal shards in this fantastical adventure.

name: Alien Death Mob
summary: Aliens have invaded Earth! Towns, cities, deserts, they're everywhere! Take on the role of Earth's last super soldier and confront the alien menace in this intense twin stick shooter!

name: Alive 2 Survive
summary: Zombie hordes. Hostile humans. Fight to survive! Swipe your way through life or death decisions where each choice can be the difference between surviving the apocalypse or joining the zombie horde. A swipe-to-survive zombie apocalypse decision making adventure.

name: All Abug!
summary: Faced with the threat of a wave of toxic fumes, embark on an expedition to save yourself from certain death. Gobble up obstacles on your path to allow your caterpillar to move along and board survivors who also seek asylum!

name: Alone?
summary:
Alone is a Psychological horror game that changes around you as you play.

When Sam receives a letter from his sister Michelle, asking for help, he ventures back to the hostel where he grew up. Little did he know, what he was about to encounter.

Can you track down your missing sister, and discover the strange occurrences happening at the home where he grew up?

name: Almazy
summary: Almazy is a classic indie arcade game for the fans of Boulder Dash and Emerald Mine genres. It features 100 unique hand-crafted levels by the hardcore fans of the genre.

name: All-Star Fighters
summary: Known in Japan as "The All*Star Kakutou Matsuri". All-Star Fighters is the 91st entry in the Simple 2000 budget game series for the PS2, bringing together characters and locales from many different Simple 2000 games in a bizarre fighting tournament.

name: Alan's Automaton Workshop
summary: Alan's Automaton Workshop is an open-ended programming puzzle game. Start a new business with Alan Turing and his groundbreaking innovation: the Turing Machine. Build unique automatons, and solve all kinds of problems from clients.

name: Altair Assault
summary: Altair Assault is a retro inspired space shootem up! but inside immersive Virtual Reality. Our aim from the beginning of development has been to re-create classic side scrolling space shooters we played growing up in the 80’s such as R-Type.

name: Alex's Mobs
summary: Alex's Mobs is a Forge mod that adds 89 new mobs to Minecraft. All of these mobs fall into either two categories: most of them are real world creatures, like Grizzly Bears, Roadrunners, Orcas, etc; but some of them are purely fictional, like the Endergade and Bone Serpent. All of these creatures fulfill a necessary purpose, and either have unique drops, mechanics or functions, as there are no purely aesthetic creatures. That said, they also help make some environments in the game feel more alive. The models, textures, animations and AI are all stylistically compatible with the vanilla game's latest additions.

name: Albatroz
summary: Leave your dull urban life behind and set out on a journey to find your lost brother, who disappeared while looking to reach a mythical mountain called Albatroz. Use your survival skills to traverse beautiful yet challenging landscapes, ranging from scorching coastal regions to freezing mountains. Manage your resources, strengthen your body, and improve your abilities as you face the wilderness head-on. Discover yourself as you find that the journey might actually be just as important as the destination.

name: Alex: An Adventure Between the Ages
summary: Dive into a dark, but quite funny story about a schoolboy who fell into another world and now cannot get out of there. Help Alex to pass through all the trials that will come his way. Solve puzzles, escape from monsters, and try to find out what's going on.

name: Alchemist Historical Simulator
summary: Alchemist Historical Simulator invites you into the mystical world of medieval alchemy. Experience the daily lives of true alchemists, experiment with rare ingredients, and craft potions. Unlock ancient secrets, master transmutation, and shape your destiny in this immersive historical simulator.

name: Alone in the Grey
summary: Alone in the Grey is an adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - FTR: Revival Pack
summary: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X

name: A List of People Who Went Missing in the Scheleirland National Forest
summary: A horror visual novel. This is the story of a woman who tried to avoid a terrible fate.

name: Alisa's Grimoire
summary: Alisa comes across a Grimoire that seals the soul of a powerful sorcerer by chance. Through its power, Alisa becomes a sorcerer and learns that the academy is actually a laboratory for magical experiments. To save her loved ones, Alisa takes on a battle against sorcerers.

name: Alive
summary: Learn about humanity’s sin of greed in an escape room game where you play as Chris, a poor young man who looks for easy ways to get money but ends up in a virtual reality he can’t escape. Help Chris escape the rooms while uncovering the story behind them, and the man who created them.

name: Alone K.W.
summary: Dr. Kevin White, a drug manufacturing manager in the same company was sent to a conference in Greenland. In turn, the ship was caught in the ice and crashed. The main character was thrown by an unknown island. Seeing the house, Kevin went there. Having found a tunnel through the wall, that prompted him to go to a place where it is better not to go.

name: All Aspect Warfare
summary: An elite strike team — with a thermo-nuclear weapon. Stranded. On a hostile and near desolate planet. Left for dead. What else could possibly go wrong? The Terrans have been at war with the Gammulan race for years. Deployed in a distant territory on the other side of the galaxy the Terran Galactic Command (GALCOM) has suffered repeated defeats and unprecedented losses. In an attempt to change the tide of war and take the battle to the enemy GALCOM has launched an all out attack on the Gammulan homeworlds.

name: All on Board!: The Hunger
summary: Hunt humans, fulfill secret missions, and race against time in this VR adaptation of The Hunger for All On Board! Will you become the most notorious vampire, or be caught by sunrise?

name: Alone
summary: Left Alone at his workplace, Alex wasn't prepared for what's coming next. From finding keys, observing bloodcurdling scenes to solving puzzles, dealing with spine-chilling paranormal activities and coming up with strategies to solve multiple scenes Alex struggles to make it to his home.

name: Alicia Quatermain 2: The Stone of Fate
summary: Alicia Quatermain, the granddaughter of a famous traveler Alan Quatermain, is starting out for jungles of India in quest of a powerful artifact.

name: Aliens versus Predator 2
summary: The sequel to one of the most frightening games ever made, Aliens vs. Predator 2 takes you to Planet LV1201, where three diverse and bloodthirsty species battle for survival. The story-driven plot weaves together the fates of all three races, while the action is as heart-stopping as the blockbuster films on which it is based. Choose to play as Alien, Predator, or Marine as you use your physical prowess, killer instincts, or superior firepower to stay alive.

name: All Aboard! The Twilight Train
summary: All Aboard! The Twilight Train is a first-person narrative-adventure set on an interdimensional train. Explore the train, talk to the passengers, drink carrot juice, and help fellow passengers make it to their destination off this weird train.

name: Alloy: Arena
summary: Alloy: Arena is a game created by MindChamber and PsychoGoldfish. The minigame consists of using combos of guns, punches, and kicks to kill the gang known as "Da 'Hood Rats" and also the robotic cyber-dogs called "Cyber Pit Bulls." The game has over 3 million views and features in the Flash Portal History 2004 Collection.

name: Alter Psycho
summary: No one ever listened to you. Because they never truly knew you. Now the forest whispers, the fire rises, and they all watch you. Could you be innocent, or are you merely a well-hidden disaster?

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Preorder the Digital Deluxe Edition of Alfred Hitchcock - Vertigo to receive exclusive preorder bonuses.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

- Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
- In-game filters, inspired by the original movie
- Ed, Julia & Nick Avatars
- Wallpapers

name: A Lakeside Walk in the Dolomites
summary: A solitary evening walk along one of the most beautiful lakes in the Dolomites. The air in Alleghe is crisp, the stillness envelops the path, and the water glistens with the last rays of the sun. Suddenly, the silence shifts. It grows dense. A noise stirs in the woods, a shadow slipping beyond your gaze. Is solitude your only company? With every step, you venture further; at every corner, another piece of a lost mystery unfolds. As you move deeper into the unnatural quiet of the forest, doubts creep in. Are these really just old stories? And the lake... the lake watches.

name: All Is Dust
summary: All Is Dust is a first-person horror game for PC and Oculus Rift. Experience the terror of a dust storm in the 1930s and unravel the mystery surrounding your decaying farm.

name: Al Sira
summary: "Al Sira" is a narrative-driven puzzle game that lets you uncover the life, teachings, and actions of Muhammad, the Prophet of Islam. Solve mysteries, explore key historical events, and piece together his remarkable legacy in this immersive and thought-provoking journey.

name: Alessia's Dollhouse
summary: Alessia's Dollhouse is a first-person psychological horror game that will take your breath away. In the dead of night, on a deserted road, you take on the role of Darren, an ordinary pizza delivery guy, in a creepy dollhouse filled with sinister secrets. But this time, your delivery address will drag you into an unimaginable vortex of horror.

name: AlterVerse: Disruption
summary:
Disruption is the first of several planned games in the AlterVerse. You’ll start your adventure aboard a massive Disrupter starship exploring the Solone solar system, raiding and looting as you go. Your Objective is to climb the Ranks by earning XP!

5 Games in 1 plus Tournaments
Starship Raider: Make your fortune looting Ship’s treasure chests!
Alliance Wars: Lead your Alliance to glory in Capture the Flag action!
Free-For-All Brawl: A Deathmatch style Launchbay Fighting Frenzy!
Altercation: Challenge other players to PVP battles, Race the XR75s!
Hero’s Quest: Find the keys and save the ship from self-destruction!
Esports Tournaments: Compete and Win Prizes!

More Features:

Customizable Avatars
Customizable Alliance Pages
Level Up XP Ranking System
Player-owned Servers
VR Compatible – Rift & Vive

name: Alone in the Dark
summary: Alone in the Dark is a reboot of the original game and the fifth installment of the series. It features a new storyline and characters while still maintaining the core elements of the survival horror genre. The game is set out through DVD-style episodes where the player can choose to start from the beginning or choose to skip to a section if they get stuck. There is also a strong emphasis on exploration, atmosphere and tension with players needing to use stealth and strategy to avoid detection by enemies.

name: Aliens Go Home Run!
summary: Aliens Go Home Run is a brick-breaking alien-busting action game that puts you in the shoes of Sally, a young girl with a passion for baseball. When she hits a home run so hard that it flies into space, it crashes on a faraway planet and creates a crater in the process. Now, the aliens from that planet are invading Earth, and its up to Sally to save the day! Unlike most breakout games, the game isn't over if the ball touches the ground. Instead, the player has to avoid various projectiles shot by enemies. If they get hit, they get a strike, and three strikes means they're out! With plenty of power-ups, 70 exciting levels, 8 bosses, and a full-blown level editor, Aliens Go Home Run is breakout like you've never seen it before.

name: Aliens'n Tanks
summary:
On a quiet day in a log cabin in Texas, war veteran Billy Boots was watching television when he suddenly hears a loud noise in the backyard.

Surprised, he goes out to investigate to see what happened and realizes that aliens are invading the United States.

Billy Boots, as a good patriot, cannot allow anyone to harm his precious country, so he rides on the tank that he had stored as a memory of the Great War and with all the decision in the world, he advances towards the horizon to end the invaders.

Will he be victorious?

name: Alpacapaca Dash
summary: Alpacapaca Dash is an endless runner with lasers and alpacas, a fun, cute and addictive game. Try to get the highest score, the highest amount of coins, unlock all alpacas and play until you can fully restore the world!

name: Alice Fiction
summary:
Welcome to the fake world.

A new Puzzle RPG game, Alice Fiction for smartphone, set in the Metaverese ALICE surrounded by a temporary peace, is now available, explore the truth of this world.

Alice Fiction is a new puzzle RPG game presented on the same worldview by Wonder Planet, the developer of the new smash-and-bash Battle RPG sensation "Crash Fever".

name: Ale Tavern Master
summary: Where Every Pint Poured Starts a New Story.

name: Alertes Spéciales
summary:
Manage the French emergency services in a realistic and strategic simulation game.

In Special Alerts, you play as the emergency operations manager. Coordinate firefighters, ambulances, police, gendarmerie, civil security, and many more to respond to all situations: fires, accidents, health crises, natural disasters, etc.

name: Almost Impossible!
summary: A puzzle game from Daniel Counsell.

name: Alone in the Dark: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: A Love Letter to Horror Fans

name: Altarium
summary: Altarium is a first-person, asymmetric PVP Co-Op horror game that can be played by 1-5 players together. Players can choose to play as either the victim or the evil character. Get ready, choose your role, shape your destiny, and survive!

name: All Living Things
summary: Uncover the secrets of the philosopher’s stone by solving twelve intricately animated puzzles that reveal the mysterious hidden meanings within alchemical images.

name: A Lounge Somewhere
summary: In this RPG simulation game, you can drink coffee, enjoy snacks, grow flowers, play Gashapons, play the piano, try arcade games, and play various games with the server... No matter what you do, the server won't get angry.

name: Along Together
summary: In Along Together, you are a kid's imaginary friend: their invisible companion when there’s no one else around and their guardian when things get dangerous. When their dog, Rishu, goes missing, they turn to you for help.

name: Aliens: Dark Descent - Lethe Recon Pack
summary: Get the Lethe Recon Pack to receive an exclusive Black Camo Armor Set for your squad and a unique feline companion to liven up the decks of the Otago.

name: Allan
summary: Allan is an immersive top-down view dungeon exploration and action game with a unique pixelart 3D style. Face your enemies, break throught the dungeon's puzzle. Walk in the dark. Crawl between those walls without letting them crush you.

name: Alight: Lunar Survival
summary: Stranded in the darkness, survive and build a base scattered across the lunar surface to generate electricity and alight the moon as you upgrade your equipment, struggle for oxygen, and escape fearsome monsters. Alone or together you will survive, gather, craft, build, and explore.

name: Alwa's Legacy
summary: Alwa’s Legacy is a modern retro game full of dangerous dungeons, magical items and ancient secrets. By upgrading your magic, any way forward is right in this non-linear adventure game full of exploration.

name: Altruistic
summary: This is a pixel-style casual puzzle game set against a fresh backdrop of snowy mountains and pine forests, creating a playful winter atmosphere filled with childlike wonder.

name: Alchemy Stars
summary:
Chase the light in a thrilling new adventure.
A revolutionary Line Strategy Mobile RPG!

name: Alnam no Kiba: Juuzoku Juuni Shinto Densetsu
Alarial's Blessing
summary: Experience the tragic tale of three wandering mercenaries and the lonely goddess who wouldn't let them die. Fight challenging, turn-based battles and explore a continent of forgotten mysteries in this fresh twist on the JRPG genre.

name: Alien Simulator
summary: Alien simulator is a game that allows you to feel yourself an alien. Immersify yourself into feeling yourself a true, a real alien as seen on science channels after 11:59pm. Play as classical Gray Aliens. Fly the classical UFO saucer. Kidnap earthlings and sell them into slavery to mercenaries from other parts of the galaxy. The player will be able to spend money on booze and alien strippers. In this game you can have dialogues with other aliens, explore the space which is pretty well spacious. The game mechanics include shooting, flying on a ship, drinking ability and having some fun.

name: All Black
summary: Compilation of different sport games

name: A Land Fit For Heroes
summary: A Land Fit for Heroes is a profound story of three distinct characters falling into a sequence of bloodthirsty events full of gore and mystery. It is not your average story-based RPG; A Land Fit for Heroes is darker, deeper and very explicit, primarily it’s narrative is targeted towards a mature audience. The main characters are not traditional heroes but outcasts with marred souls and questionable pasts. This is a story and character design with a truly dark twist; readers may be shocked but they will still be enthralled by Morgan’s rich and mysterious dark fantasy presented in an entirely unique format for the book series.

name: Alpha Squadron
summary: Classic Arcade Style Side Scrolling Shoot'Em Up. Dodge the enemy bullets as you fight your way through 13 levels of increasingly intense action. Play in various levels of difficulty and challenge the high score tables. Co-op up to 4 players, one survives the level, then you all start the next level.

name: Alienz!
summary: Click on the correct country to help the aliens land safely.

name: Alien Wall
summary: Alien Wall is a powerful genre mix between a brick breaker and ‘shoot em up’. Modern retro Arcade fun at its best!

name: Alien Hostage
summary:
Ready to give up?
Ready to rage?

In 'Alien Hostage' you must complete all challenges given to you by the human scientists who have trapped you on Earth.

name: Aleae
summary: Raise, multiply, and battle with dice — a dice deck-building roguelike! Utilize a unique system where all dice on the field roll simultaneously and their outcomes collide to shape the fight. In both battles and events, everything is up to the roll. Embark on a journey where luck meets strategy!

name: All Zombies Must Die! Scorepocalypse
summary:
Step into the sturdy boots of McJagger and take on an army of the undead! In the standalone spin-off to All Zombies Must Die!, the only thing that really matters is your score. Build your multiplier and rack up as many kills as possible to become the most fearsome zombie-slayer in Deadhill. To that end, the fact remains the same: all zombies must die.

As well infesting familiar locations such as Town Square, Shopping Mall and Surburbia, the undead have ambled their way into all new areas of Deadhill: the Military Base and Graveyard. McJagger will also have to deal with three new flavours of zombie: Soldier, Necro and Ghost. Our stoic hero shouldn’t be too concerned, however, there are two new weapons to help send the shufflers packing: Mini-gun and Rocket Launcher. Boom!

Your score is based on a combination of two multipliers, one of which increases as you complete quests that appear organically as you play, and the other based on how many environmental modifiers you’ve managed to apply to the undead. Use fire, shock, sonic and radiation – and the environments themselves - to your full advantage, and send that score soaring!

name: Always: Ill
summary: After losing his daughter, a broken detective clings to the sound of her voice — until an accident pulls him into a twisted nightmare. Trapped in haunting echoes of her past, he must solve puzzles and uncover chilling clues to stop a deranged man from sacrificing his child... to bring back his own.

name: All One
summary:
The third game to be released as a coverdisk for the Japanese Famimaga magazine. All One is a block-pushing puzzle game in which every die must have their "one" side facing upwards.

All One, or Famimaga Disk Vol. 3 All One, is a puzzle game in which the player controls a ladybug pushing over dice. The goal of each stage is to push all the dice onto their side so that their "one" side is facing upwards. The player is given a smaller first-person view window from the ladybug's perspective to allow them to see the sides of each die and plan out their strategy.

As with other block-pushing puzzle games, the game becomes similar to Sokoban or Adventures of Lolo in its complexity as it progresses: there is often only a few (or just one) paths to successfully solving a stage and the player will need to restart if they make a mistake.

name: Algatraz
summary: Play as an alligator in ALGATRAZ, a unique prison setting where you decide your path: explore the sprawling grounds, assist guards, uncover hidden secrets, or wreak havoc on detainees and staff. With no rules or mandatory missions, the choice is yours in this dynamic, player-driven experience.

name: Altera
summary:
Altera is a faction-based hardcore troop FPS with RPG and roguelike mechanics. Recruit & hack units, gather resources & gear. Deploy with your troop in the faction based PvPvE game mode Terra Control. Or play the Intrusion Co-op campaign.

Do you really have what it takes to become a troop commander?

name: Alien Invaders
summary: Alien Invaders is a variant of Space Invaders . A 14x5 rectangular formation of enemy spacecraft appears from the top of the screen, and slowly gets closer to the surface of the Earth. You control a mobile missile launcher that can shoot up at the invaders, while the aliens try to bomb you. As in Space Invaders, there are fortifications which can give you some shelter from the bombs, and these are slowly worn away as they are bombarded. There is also an enemy mother-ship that appears overhead, which gives you bonus points. But unlike Space Invaders, there is only one wave. Once the main enemy formation is defeated, you can only gain more points by aiming at the mother-ships until the five minute timer runs out.

name: Alien Invasion
summary: The goal of the game is to blast the alien forces and get the highest score possible with your three lives. The tougher the enemy is to destroy, the greater the chance they will drop a valuable power-up.

name: Alien Shooter
summary: Evil aliens captured secret military base. You have to destroy them all and save the world. You can use different weapons, such as guns, bombs and flamethrower. Uncompromised combats during many levels await you in this game.

name: Alchemistress Vivi
summary: Alchemistress Vivi is a code-breaking logic puzzle that should take approximately 20 to 25 minutes to complete. In each level, up to 6 magic items must be arranged in a certain order to cast powerful spells. Every try results in a feedback that helps the player to eventually find the right sequence. But watch out: There's only a limited number of lives available for this.

name: Alien Cartographer
summary: Alien Cartographer is a Minesweeper-like logic deduction puzzle game, where the player has to identify various buildings on a hexagonal grid using environmental hints and the strict rules of their architecture.

name: A lenda da Gávea
summary: A lenda da Gávea is a science-fiction text adventure game about exploring the Pedra da Gávea mountain and its secrets.

name: Alternate DiMansion Diary
summary: An university student named Sae finds herself lost in the mountains. While searching for help, she comes across an old looking mansion and decides to enter it. However, there was more to this mansion than meets the eye. What will become of Sae? Find out in this Adventure-Puzzle RPG!

name: Alpaca Rancher
summary: Tame, Farm, Forage and Explore in the wonderful world of Alpaca Rancher! Collect and care for a variety of unique alpacas. Cultivate crops to grow for your ranch. Forage for resources to help your neighbors and find exciting items! Explore the world to find new friends, alpacas and more!

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Limited Edition
summary:
You and your friends are the deadliest killers in the galaxy. Another glorious day in the Corps.

Buckle up, soldier! Welcome to Aliens: Colonial Marines. Created by Gearbox, the critically acclaimed and fan-favourite developers of Borderlands and Brothers In Arms, you and your friends will become the most badass military outfit in the galaxy – the US Colonial Marines. It’s up to you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno infestation.

The Limited Edition Pack includes:

- 4 movie characters: Play as Apone, Hicks, Hudson and Drake from the Aliens movie in competitive multiplayer.
- Ripley's Flamethrower: Raise hell with this pulse rifle and flamethrower combo.
-Additional marine customisation: Define the look of your marine in online multiplayer.

name: Alcatmist
summary:
Looking for a relaxing casual game to enjoy every day?
Jump into a magical merge adventure with adorable, mysterious cats.

name: Alas Astra
summary: Among distant stars a lone Robot Knight must stand against an ancient and unfathomable evil. Explore the vast and alien Degathalion space station and battle the nefarious Xetanoids in a daring quest to confront their rulers and save the Centaurus galaxy.

name: Alien Attack
summary:
Alien Attack is an ASCII text game. You control a ship and have to destroy the alien fighters. The aliens will stop at nothing to destroy the Earth. Let one by and you lose.

You have to be quick because the aliens come in sets of threes. After a little while, the speed of the game increases and you have to be fast because it gets faster and faster. You have to have good timing in this game because if you miss once in the fastest speed, you're done. There are no power-ups in this game. A high score table keeps track of the players' results.

name: Alimardan Meets Merlin
summary: Merlin, the wizard? The Wizard of Oz? Or the wicked Morgana, daughter of Uther, the Enchanter? None! Seeing some aliens on his way to the moon, Ali Mardan Khan decides to jump out of the spaceship. Little did he know that his calculations were wrong and so he finds himself in the Middle Ages. There, he should pose as “the Wizard Baby of Oz” and solve the mystery of missing kids, find Merlin and King Arthur, save the wicked Morgana, and even find Excalibur!!

name: Allegro Molto wo Kiku Game
summary: A relaxing visual novel where you tune in to Allegro Molto’s piano livestream. Enjoy calm improvisations and flowing chat as a quiet listener.

name: All of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
summary: This bundle includes all the works related to the Touhou Mystia's Izakaya series.

name: Almania
summary: The free game accompanying the third season of the German TV series Almania. The plays joins the school as a new student. They walk around, follow quests, build items in the school, upgrade rooms, harvest items and virtual currency with the overall goal of having a nice school function. The game is as a humorous, story-driven simulation.

name: Alien: Isolation - Lost Contact
summary:
Welcome to Lost Contact, the fourth add-on content pack for Alien: Isolation, returning to the epic Salvage Mode.

Trapped in deep space on board Sevastopol, you'll need to explore the station to complete objectives and survive. Can you evade your enemies across ten waves of challenges, or will you take them head-on?

- The second all new Salvage Mode map, featuring the Lorenz Private Wards and the Emergency Power Plant.
- Play as fan-favourite Axel and equip yourself with the Revolver and Boltgun.
- Try to survive encounters with Working Joes, other humans and the terrifying Alien itself.

name: All will Rise
summary: The river is a god, and they killed it. It’s time for ordinary people to hold them to account. Manage your team. Mix with ecoterrorists and godmen. Build your deck, follow leads and find allies. Make your case, and win the battle for the future.

name: All Our Broken Parts
summary:
Experience a story-driven adventure/VN game as a robot doctor.

In a city of robots, illness is looming. Crack open ports and units to trace causes. Diagnose, repair and cross paths with robots and stories.

Uncover secrets buried in the past and future, discover the truth that makes each robot unique.

name: Alice's Wonderland: Cast in Shadow - Collector's Edition
Alice's Wonderland 4: Festive Craze - Collector's Edition
Alchemy
summary: Discover what lies beyond our reality with Alchemy. A portal-like experience that will challenge you to think with potions while trying to solve the mysteries of this strange new place.

name: Alien Harvest Leader
summary: Collect rare specimen, equipment, and technology while navigating the hazards of the Earth-like Harvest Zone: Tornados, Black Helicopters, Five Z Towers, Anti-Aircraft guns and more. Gain the resources necessary to build up your Martian base and defend against the Martian wildlife while maintaining your favor with the Martian Queen and your alien Workers.

name: Alice's Wonderland 3: Shackles of Time - Collector's Edition
Alicia Quatermain: Secret of the Lost Treasures - Collector's Edition
Aldo's Assault
summary: Aldo's Assault" is the third in a series of MS-DOS platform/arcade titles inspired by the Super Mario Bros. series. The player controls Aldo who climbs ladders onto steel beams while dodging barrels and grabbing treasure. A timer counts down and each bit of treasure adds to the player's score at the end of each stage. Aldo eventually careens across the skyscrapers of Kong City attempting to steal a treasure chest from an enemy helicopter, and in the next stage we realize he is a wanted criminal. No giant ape makes an appearance, and barrels materialize from no where to torment Aldo. If a player loses all of their lives, they are pushed back to the DOS command prompt.

name: Alchemist Tris's Desire
summary: Control the main character, Alchemist Tris. and collect the materials for the items needed to solve the problems of the villagers. This is an RPG in which the player collects the materials for the items needed to solve the problems while exploring the forest.

name: Alicia Quatermain 4: Da Vinci and the Time Machine
summary: A new and unforgettable adventure: you’ll visit the Louvre, ancient Egypt and even the Atlantis!

name: Alterna Vvelt: Blue Exorcist Another Story
summary:
Show me... Show me a new story only you can create.

Experience the world of the popular dark fantasy Blue Exorcist in a brand-new 3D Action RPG!
Become an Exorcist and explore True Cross Academy Town!
So, what do you think? Care to take a journey?

name: Alice's Spiritual Judge
summary: It is a exploration adventure game focused on the story and very similar to escape game.

name: Alex: Virus Composer
summary: Alex: Virus Composer is an unreleased Sega Dreamcast game.

name: Alexander: The Road to Percia
summary:
Alexander: The Road to Percia is an unreleased Sega Dreamcast game.

"Percia" is likely a mistranslation of "Persia", but all sources for this game use this mispelling.

name: Alcohol & Ammo
summary: You go shootin' with your friend Jeb.

name: Al Unser Jr.'s Road to the Top
summary:
Al Unser Jr.'s Road to the Top is a Super NES racing video game where the player has to progress from go-karts to snowmobiles, IROC racing cars, and eventually to Indy racing cars.

If the player does well, then his/her final challenge is to take on Al Unser, Jr. in the final event at Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. This race uses the Molson Indy Vancouver as a final test of the player's hard-earned skills. Of course, the player can also practice every stage of the game except the final stage. Go-kart racing involves regional action in the United States of America while snowmobiles provide challenge for the game's simulated winter months. Competing in the stock cars of the IROC is considered to be gaining experience for the faster and lighter open wheel vehicles of the Indy league.

name: Alkahest
summary: Alkahest is an Action-Adventure RPG set in a murky medieval world. Where satisfying melee combat with highly interactive environments takes center stage. Explore realistic locations, learn alchemy and make a name for your family.

name: Alaska Solitaire Classic Card Game
summary: Enjoy playing Alaska Solitaire from the #1 Classic Card Game Collection for free. Customize your game with awesome card designs, backgrounds and win animations adding even more fun to this classic game.

name: All Men Are Pigs
summary:
A queer and raunchy adult comedy with a tropical flavor. As the main character, you get to move to a Caribbean island named Santa Locura, working the summer away in a bar named The Inqueersition.

Your day to day routine gets derailed by the men you meet, all of them hiding a dealbreaker in their closet. What IS their deal? WHY is it so hard to find a proper man? Do you even NEED a man?

...well, this is a dating sim, so we’ll go with “yes”.

You will get to interact with your friends, coworkers and possible love interests in a variety of ways. Will you manage to land the man of your dreams and love him despite the issues they might have, or will they chew you up and spit you like gum?

name: Aliens TC
summary:
Aliens TC is a total conversion based on the movie Aliens, created in 1994 by Justin Fisher.

It was the first total conversion and is one of the most famous. In the week following the release of Doom II, there was more discussion in the Doom newsgroups related to Aliens TC than to Doom II. The popularity of the TC even reached outside the Doom community, for instance providing inspiration for the 1998 Dreamworks game Trespasser. Fisher was offered employment by various game developers (including Dreamworks for the team that would later make Trespasser), but declined in order to finish his university degree.

name: Alan Wake's American Nightmare
summary:
Alan Wake's American Nightmare is a standalone expansion to the psychological horror action-adventure game Alan Wake, developed by Remedy Entertainment. The story shifts to an alternate reality where Alan Wake finds himself in a small Arizona town. Here, he faces off against his evil doppelgänger, Mr. Scratch, a murderous entity intent on destroying everything Alan holds dear.

The gameplay involves exploring the town, battling new and familiar supernatural enemies, and uncovering pieces of the narrative through manuscripts and other clues. The expansion introduces new weapons and combat mechanics while maintaining the series' focus on the use of light to combat darkness. The narrative explores themes of duality and reality, offering a more action-oriented experience compared to the original game.

name: Alchemy Frogs
summary: Alchemy Frogs is a local co-op puzzle platformer game with a 3D, isometric camera, in which Frog & Toad traverse a poisoned swamp to look for a cure that will help them save their family from being turned to stone. Frog & Toad will mix their potions to unleash powerful magical effects.

name: Alcoholic Daddy
summary: In this 2D arcade racing game, take on the role of a father who must complete a simple but important mission - to deliver his beloved dog to his daughter. However, the task is complicated by the fact that the father has had a bit too much to drink.

name: Alien Hominid
summary: They've got your spaceship and you will blow up anything in your path to get it back. Completely hand-drawn high-definition graphics, coupled with old-school game play, results in ultimate mayhem and hours of fun!

name: Always with You
summary: "Always with you" is a cute and relaxing action-puzzle game. Switch freely between controlling a girl and a cat, solve clever puzzles, explore the ancient Alto civilization, and defeat unruly guardians. Embark on an exciting adventure with three cats to find your mother!

name: All Alone with Mannie
summary: All Alone with Mannie is a difficult, quick reflex, survival horror game where your only allies are a flashlight, and a blanket, but be careful how you blink... It could be your downfall.

name: Alea
summary: A Balatro-like deck-building strategy battler built on Yacht dice hands. Weigh odds, manage rerolls, and chain rune effects to defeat Tarot-inspired enemies. Roll the dice and resist fate.

name: Alice no Paint Adventure
summary:
There is a story mode, a painting mode, and midway-style games. Story mode comes in interactive mode (with passwords) or as a short movie that can be watched in less than an hour. Although the game is directed towards children, literacy in both Japanese and English is required in order to properly enjoy the story mode and to fully understand the rules. The three arcade games present in the game include painting the roses red, whacking characters from the story, matching creatures like in the card game Concentration. The painting mode can be likened to an extremely simplified version of Mario Paint.

There is only one eraser tool and paintings cannot be saved into memory or printed on a printer. Only 16 colors can be used on canvases that feature the film's characters; the full 256-color spectrum is reserved for the blank canvas. While the blank canvas allows for total creativity for older children, the "character canvases" are good for teaching hand-to-eye coordination with very young children. During the interactive adventure, the Queen of Hearts divides a magic globe into three different colored miniature globes. As a result, all the color in Wonderland turns into monochrome and Alice must find the globes in order to restore color to Wonderland.

Additional content was unlocked by scanning barcodes with Barcode Battler II connected via a "Barcode Battler II Interface".

name: Alpaca Stacka
summary: A 3D adventure platformer where you play as a kind alpaca dedicated to helping their animal friends.

name: A Long Journey to an Uncertain End
summary: A Long Journey to an Uncertain End is a narrative management space opera where you recruit eclectic crew members, explore the known - and unknown - galaxy, make choices to drive your journey, and escape the clutches of your abusive ex.

name: Alpine: The Simulation Game
summary: Welcome to the beautiful world of mountains! In Alpine - The Simulation Game you can expect a varied story mode with many missions, and all this in the middle of a lovingly designed game world in the snowy Alps.

name: All on Board!: Istanbul
summary: Compete for riches in this VR adaptation of Istanbul for All On Board! Lead your merchant and assistants through the bazaar, trade goods, and race to collect rubies before your rivals claim victory.

name: Alien Cat Story
summary: Get ready for an amazing adventure on an alien planet, full of dangers, puzzles and unexpected allies in the game Alien Cat Story. Only you can help the cat fix his ship and leave this dangerous world.

name: Alien Hominid 360
summary:
They've got your spaceship, so blow up anything in your path to get it back. Completely hand-drawn high-definition graphics coupled with old-school game play results in ultimate mayhem. This addictive, side-scrolling shooter features cute, quirky humor and adjustable cartoon gore.

Alien Hominid HD features jump-in-anytime multiplayer action, immersive environments, award-winning bosses, and over 30 fashionable hats. This 2-D console experience comes jam-packed with seven mini-games, including several four-player party games. All You Can Eat, Neutron Ball, and PDA Games will keep the party going for hours on end.

name: All On Board!: Aye, Dark Overlord!
summary: The Dark Overlord demands answers in this fast-paced party game, perfect for newcomers and seasoned players, adapted for VR in All On Board! Play as a trembling goblin making wild excuses or step into the role of the Dark Overlord. Improvise, shift blame, and outwit your friends to escape doom!

name: Alien Cow Rampage: Orion Needs Your Milk!
summary:
In an original boardgame that could be described as the jumpsuit-clad cousin of Chainsaw Warrior and Munchkin, you're an alien on the run. Within 12 hours you need to make it through a mazy suburbs, abduct cows from heavily guarded pastures, and brave an Earthling military base in order to catch a ride on your mothership.

There is little time. There are many dangers. But you CAN make it, and there are always cows.

name: Alien Evolution
summary: Alien Evolution is a Minecraft mod that overhauls hostile mobs with evolutionary variants and new behaviors, introducing mutated creatures, tiered life stages, and evolving biomes that alter combat and exploration.

name: Alone: Cold Winter
summary: Alone - Cold Winter is reimagination of Alone - Eternal Nightmare, which is a RPG-Maker action-horror game, that was heavily inspired by cult classics like Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Project Zero.

name: All the Mods 10: To the Sky
summary: ATM10: To the Sky fuses the massive variety of All the Mods 10 with the classic Skyblock challenge. Begin with just a tree and a single block, and build your sky empire using magic, tech, automation, and exploration.

name: Alpha Response
summary: From Gooseman, creator of the original Counter-Strike mod - Alpha Response delivers intense police action in dynamic, real-world environments. Fight solo or with friends against diverse enemies in high-stakes missions that demand tactical precision and split-second decisions.

name: AlterEgo: Browser-Based Life Simulation Game
summary:
What if you could live your life over again? In Alter Ego, you can find out. In this text-based interactive fiction, you choose what happens next. It's in the style of choose-a-path books, but with over a thousand multiple-choice questions, it's much longer and deeper than traditional gamebooks. Alter Ego starts at birth and ends at death, including two substantially different versions, depending on whether you choose to be male or female.

Will you grow up to be confident and happy? Will you fight with bullies, or befriend them? Will you find a date to the senior prom? Will you marry and have kids, or start your own business and become a millionaire? The choice is yours. If you enjoy interactive novels, you'll love Alter Ego. This game will change your life. (official Text) 

Developer's Comment: "Alter Ego was originally written by Peter J. Favaro, Ph.D. It was published in 1986 for the Commodore 64, MS-DOS, Apple II, and Macintosh. The current edition of the Alter Ego game is a production of Choose Multiple LLC." (https://www.playalterego.com/credits.html)

name: Alone in the Dark
summary: Alone in the Dark weaves a chilling tapestry of psychological horror and Southern Gothic charm, reimagining the iconic game that set the benchmark for the genre. We invite you to join us on a journey into madness, where each encounter could be your last. With each step you take closer to unravelling Derceto's mystery, the eyes that watch from the darkness grow hungrier. Every bullet means the difference between survival and an unthinkable end. The next door you unlock could lead to a nightmarish realm offering nothing but slashing claws, grasping tentacles, and frayed sanity. Journey to interbellum Louisiana, where an era of decadence hides a darker tale - of escape from past traumas and an intolerant society, into the waiting grasp of something darker, something that has patiently lurked for impossible eons. This is Alone in the Dark as you've never seen it - a skillfully-woven narrative of Southern Gothic elegance and eldritch madness that pays homage to its legendary origins while taking the next step forward in survival horror storytelling.

name: All Quite on the Bridge: Mad Cliff
summary: All Quite On The Bridge: Mad Cliff is a VR exclusive first person fantasy shooter. Filled with impressive special effects and exiting game tracks.

name: AlcheMice
