As in Color Zen, there are no points or penalties for failure - only you, your headphones, and the collected wisdom of the world.

name: Allkpop Allstar
summary: Allkpop Allstar is a finger-based rhythm game.

name: Alien Attack
summary: A shoot'em up that was published as a listing in MSX Computer Magazine #7, March 1986 on page 73.

name: A la Fenetre
summary: A girl and a boy remembering how life was before the world's longest lockdown.

name: Alma
summary: Alma - Turn based strategy game on a board

name: Allemand avec Rayman
summary: A port of English with Rayman which teaches German.

name: Alchemical Keyboard
summary: Play through an interactive music video where you modify the world around you using alchemy in order to progress through the song!

name: A Lot Like Love
summary: Rachel comes home on vacation to not only celebrate, but also get to know Jennifer's boyfriend. Neither Rachel, nor Jennifer, nor her boyfriend even imagine what this will lead to.

name: All-in-One Mahjong 2
summary: All-in-One Mahjong 2 is a relaxing tile-matching puzzle game where players clear the board by pairing identical tiles. Featuring 48 unique layouts and 12 soothing backgrounds, the game offers two modes: Timed Mode with shuffle options and Score Mode for strategic play. With tranquil music and intuitive gameplay, it's designed for casual players seeking a meditative Mahjong experience.

name: Alpha Kimori: Great Doubt - Episode Two
A.L.T.
summary: A 32-map megawad for Doom II from the Russian Doom clan Clan B0S know for its surreal narrative built around traditional Doom gameplay.

name: All Star Janken: Battle Portable
summary: Select your favorite idol and match her in "Paper Scissors Stone". If she loses, she will drop one piece of her clothes until wearing only her swimming dress. Each game consits of five rounds. If you can win all five rounds in a row, you can view a special ending sequence. Every time you pass one game, you will receive a passcode. Win against all nice idols to unlock a special sequence.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion
summary: AEW: Fight Forever Elite Beats and Stampede Expansion is FREE to ALL AEW: Fight Forever players and features five new music tracks and 20 new skins! A very special thank you to the fans that made AEW the fastest growing wrestling promotion.

name: Alien Blitz
summary:
Alien Blitz is a 3d action-shooter with lots of bullets, missiles, weapons, maps and monsters.

Take your shotgun and go kill some Aliens !

name: Alice and The Ancients
summary: Advance forward, surpassing all the Ancients on the battlefield!

name: All My Friends Are Frogs
summary: if you use your imagination

name: Alice in Maze
summary: A puzzle game from Doorknob Soft.

name: Alpine Surfer
summary: Players can freeboard or gate race while performing numerous air tricks and listening to rock and alternative music. 2 downhill courses and 2 levels of difficulty provide the player with 4 challenging options.

name: Altered Space
summary: The player is an astronaut trapped on an alien spaceship who has to try to find his way out while avoiding aliens and continually replenishing his oxygen supply. This was the first isometric view game on the Game Boy

name: Alien Town Invasion
summary: Sci fi survival based game.

name: All Star Quarterback
summary: A football game from Full Fat.

name: AlienXcape
summary: AlienXcape is a 3D first-person shooter set in a science fiction world where you were captured during your last raid on the Wymacet horde. Now you must find a way out of your cell and fight your way through three levels.

name: Alter Army
summary: Alter Army is a fast paced action platformer. The universe is dying and you are one of the last few trying to take control of the last resources. Fight your way through hundreds of monsters and bosses in different biomes using your weaponary and collect special crystals to just to live a few more decades.

name: Almost My Floor: Halloween Party
summary: New adventure is waiting for Alex! Halloween party with old acquaintances and friends. What could go wrong?

name: Alice's Moo-vie night
summary: A free RPG, where Alice faces unspeakable dangers just to get to Moo-vie night!

name: Alchimia
summary: After 10 long years of studying you can finally fulfill your dreams - opening your own potion shop. Ludum Dare 51 game.

name: Alanna: The Princess of Puzzles
summary: Enjoy this awesome game full of monsters, pixel art based, with excellent music, 4 bosses and 20 levels to explore the castle, use swords and bows, get familiars, a lot of items, and solve different puzzles to go to the next area.

name: Alien Shooter in Space Cradle: Virtual Reality
summary: Alien Shooter in Space Cradle - Virtual Reality - Sci/Fi shooting game in virtual reality.

name: Aldoria
summary: Explore your way through the dangerous fantasy land of Aldoria where a single hit will kill you! Slay monsters and collect magical abilities in this small skill-testing metroidvania.

name: Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains
summary: Rotten Brains (can be considered "Alpha Sphere Zero: Rotten Brains") is a complete overhaul SMW Horror ROM Hack focused on pure storytelling and atmosphere. This is the prequel to Alpha Sphere the original.

name: Alabama Smith in the Quest of Fate
summary: Alabama Smith is back in an all-new time-twisting adventure involving powerful relics that could alter the destiny of mankind! Join Alabama and his girlfriend, Anastasia, as they hunt for the elusive Crystals of Fortune using the Amulet of Time. Jump back and forth between the past and the present to solve mind-bending puzzles, search for cleverly hidden objects and stop a shadowy nemesis from finding the Crystals first!

name: Alchem It
summary: Become an alchemist shopkeeper and serve potions to your customers. Master your tools to gather many ingredients and brew potions as fast as you can. Unlock new tools, levels and decorate your dream alchemy shop.

name: Alice to Marisa to Inakunatta Shanghai Ningyou
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Alice's Jigsaw: Time Travel
summary: Solve 100 unique patchwork mosaics with your favorite heroes!!

name: Alien Story: Fairy tale with games for kids
Alchemy Mastery
summary: A game where you take part in an immersive chemical laboratory simulation. Produce various mixtures using equipment and substances. Use mostly mouse controls to pour chemicals from vessel to vessel.

name: Alien Virus
summary: Alien virus is a rpg adventure with a classic turn based system. Fight zombies and survive the onslaught!

name: Alien Reign
summary: Alien Reign is a cancelled sci-fi real time strategy game in development by SquareSoft USA (Redmond) in late 1995 / early 1996. While the project was still in early concept phase when it was canned and no console was decided yet, by looking at the partnership between Squaresoft and Sony in 1996 we can speculate that if only completed Alien Reign could have been released on the original Playstation, and maybe on PC.

name: Alexi Lalas International Soccer
summary:
Z-Axis and Take 2 Interactive's Alexi Lalas International Soccer brings the global sport to your PlayStation. Players are greeted with two options -- a friendly match and the tournament. The former is simply a single game against a friend or the computer. In both modes, players have the option to choose from 70 actual international teams complete with real rosters.

The real meat and potatoes lies within the tournament aspect. Once a team has been selected, the objective is to guide them to the World Cup -- the supreme objective in soccer. After a team plays three matches, the knock-out tournament begins. Weaker teams that are prone to losing are then dropped from the tournament as the quarterfinals begin.

name: All Fridges are Psychotic
summary: Roll Camera: Julius Brown's Adventure Begins!A retro-style point-and-click adventure, helping Julius Brown get to the Californian film-maker competition.Julius will negotiate puzzles, time travel and weak coding to try and win his ultimate prize.

name: All I Want is For All My Friends to Become Insanely Powerful
ALZ
summary:
A short game. Well more like a short film. Well more like an experimental short film in ever-so-slightly interactive of a format. 
 
Enjoy your walk. Interact with your surroundings. Or don't. Have a forgotten, but hopefully not forgetful, experience.

name: Alibaba and the Scary Dev
summary: This game is the mobile response from Qplaze to all 'Alladins' and various 'Princes'. It's a thrilling adventure story of the famous Ali-Baba on your mobile phone. Our main hero - Alibaba is not a naive and good at heart, as Alladin, it's quite the contrary. He is guileful and artful Arabian thief. He is ready for all shocks and scrapes, he is agile and strong. When his sweetheart get kidnapped, he sets out in search of her immediately, without thinking of any danger and obstacles, enemies and monsters, smashing all and every on his way. And the kidnapper is the scary Dev, who still does not know about the trouble he is already in. To get to the Dev's castle, Ali-Baba will have to cross the town, get through deserted blocks, to get the magic carpet and to fly on it over the great desert. Ali-Baba will have to use all his knowledges and skills, which he has obtained being an Arabian thief.

name: Alpine Ski Racing 2007
summary: Alpine Ski Racing 2007 is a Skiing game by JoWood Productions.

name: Alfredo and the Fetucini's
summary: Alfred n the Fettuc (Alfredo) is the ninth game of the NES version of Action 52. The full title of the game is listed as 'Alfredo and the Fetucini's' in the manual, but when starting the game from the menu it shows the title 'Alfred n the fettuc'.

name: Alter
summary: Humanity is almost extinct and only one fortress remain : Bastion. Defended since centuries by mutated humans called Alter, it may not withstand the upcoming internal and external threats. Help Mavenna change this corrupted society for something better... or worst, it's up to you.

name: Alphabet Soup for Picky Eaters
summary: A single-screen puzzle made for the 2024 edition of the Confounding Calendar.

name: Alien Afteflife
summary: Build the reincarnation machine.

name: Alice Running Adventures
summary: Different Worlds for you to explore and more world are coming Different cake types to unlock

name: Aliens Tower Defense
summary: Sometimes it's better to prevent something that might happen...

name: Alien Dead
summary:
Alien Dead is a game about escaping your dreams and awakening to an unknown overworld.
It seems you must reach the deepest part of your dreams first.

But how deep of a sleep do you have to be in?

name: Alien 3
summary:
Coinciding with the movie a cross platform game was developed, the Game Boy port was the only one not developed by Probe Software, but Bits Studio instead.

Also unlike the other games, this version is fully played with a top down perspective.

name: Albert
summary: Venture through a new land with Albert as he is looking for a new beginning, and an escape from his past.

name: Alice in Stardom
summary: Can you manage to beat your competitors to be the next top idol — and maybe even win their hearts in the process?

name: Alien Pyramid Challenge!
summary: Can you escape from the Pyramid?

name: Alone A Long
summary: In a world where you are alone, you repeat your daily routine in a nonchalant and somewhat joyful manner. A simulation game to maintain civilization where the objective is to maintain civilization until the day when you can no longer move.

name: A Long Time Ago
summary: A Long Time Ago is a 3D RPG, Adventure, Mystery game. A terrible accident happened and ever since you cannot wake up or even remember who you are.You will have to search deep inside your subconscious where all the truth about who you are is hidden and become who you used to be.

name: Alien street battle
summary: fight, smash, explore in this action-packed adventure game

name: Alien Bounty
summary: Alien Bounty is a Sci-fi bounty hunting RPG. Search for your targets among busy crowds, kill or capture them, and use your hard earned creds to upgrade & customize your character!

name: Alice
summary: Alice is a survival horror set in a Japanese construction site. Aim to escape from the construction site while escaping from the urban legendary woman.

name: All strings attached
summary: 2D package delivery

name: All is Fair in Love and Vore: The Tavorion Collection
summary: Vore visual novel! Vore! Sex! Complex characters! Profound thoughts! Women! Well-researched historical settings! Cannibalism! Never before has it been so easy to play all 6 iconic masterpieces, now with extra content!

name: Alpaca Farm!
summary:
Get ready to build the most exciting alpaca empire! Take care of amazing alpacas. Build and expand your farm. Beat the competition in exciting trade shows.
You will build an alpaca paradise, with stables, shearing rooms, spa, fitness room, … All your amazing animals generate lots of wool, that you craft into fashionable wares for the market. Hire sales managers to sell your wares on the market and earn money to expand in your farm.

name: Alone Among The Stars
summary:
Alone Among The Stars is a tabletop roleplaying game by Takuma Okada about exploring space and experiencing wondrous sights.

The original pen-and-paper game uses a dice and a deck of cards to present the player with prompts for solo RPG journaling. This port replaces the dice, cards, and written rules with a Nintendo Game Boy or your web browser, but you'll need to bring your own pen and paper.

If you've never played a solo RPG before, it can seem awkward at first, but go with it; it can be really rewarding. For more info on solo RPGs and how to play them, Dicebreaker made a great guide.

If you wish to support this game, please consider donating to the original project.

name: Alden Ridge
summary: Upcoming game from the developers of AI War.

name: All Star Karate
summary: Players will follow the life of a young, martial arts novice whose noble attempt to save an elderly man from a pack of ninjas brings him face-to-face with a true karate master.

name: All Goblin
summary: All Goblin is a surreal third person experience containing jumping puzzles, interconnected world design and a semi-automatic slingshot. All Goblin is an ever expanding Goblin Game, it contains the necessary components for a Goblin related experience.

name: Alien Looter
summary: Net Yaroze game by Ben James.

name: Alien's Return
summary: published 1983 by ITT Family Games for the Atari 2600

name: Aldro
summary: You play as Aldro, a cute slime lost in an unexplored world full of magic and mystery. Explore procedurally generated levels full of strange creatures and resources unique to the area. Cultivate anywhere you choose and gather resources to build and defend your civilization from the dangers outside.

name: Alight
summary: A young office worker, tiring of an endless life of paperwork, dreams of taking a leap of faith into the shining city below. A god of old, forsaken for centuries, reawakens to a future of neon wonder and vending machines. Drawn together by a dream, the two of you search for adventure and home in the city.

name: Aliens: Eradication
summary: A GZDoom MOD using Kontra Kommando's Aliens: Trilogy/Ultimate Doom modification as its base. Play as four unique classes against the power of the Xenomorphs, all while battling with Weyland/Yutani Company forces, opportunistic mercenaries, and malfunctioning combat droids. Play with Doom or Doom 2 wads and pwads or try the included map set for the ultimate terror.

name: Aloha Paradise Hotel
summary: Aloha is a free-to-play holiday resort building game in which you create your individual holiday paradise. Be a hotel manager and develop your hotel to be the most popular holiday destination. Chat and play with lots of other players and send tourists to your friend’s hotel.

name: ALF's Party Kit!
summary: Make party supplies with ol' ALFer!

name: Almanac of Girlswampwar Territory & The Girls Who Swim as Fertilizer Through the Warm Soil Cloaking the Roots of the Glorious Tree of Eugenics: Giving Birth to a Black Hole in a Walmart Parking Lot at 1am
summary: A 2D adventure and survival game set in a bizarre world full of mutant girls, where the deadly trading card game Demon Tarot is the only right way to achieve glory.

name: Alchemist Defender VR
summary: A tower defense strategy game designed from ground up for Virtual Reality. In Alchemist Defender VR, you assemble your defenses from above and then engage in battle first hand.

name: A Long Way Home: Director's Cut
summary:
You have been stranded 100 light years from Earth, can you survive the long way home?
After a catastrophic ship explosion, you must make your way home 1 light year at a time. Encounter exploding asteroids, teleporting dark matter, comets, aliens and more on your epic journey home.
A Long Way Home is a action / physics / puzzle game set in space. Making you way through 100 levels across 10 stages you must jump from asteroid to asteroid collecting enough dark matter to open a portal to the next level.

name: All Your Creeps
summary: 4 player tower defense game. XBLIG.

name: Alone in the Office
summary: You will play as office worker who was left to finish the job. While working on last documents you starting hearing strange sounds. How could this be? You are pretty sure that you are alone in the office.

name: A Little Rogue
summary: You must escape a deadly dundgeon with only one HP, so beware of all the sneaky enemies!

name: Alien Dogfight
summary:
The 2D action game in which you are the fighter pilot who protects the Earth from the alien invasion

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AndrewKo.AlienDogfight

name: A Little World Generator
summary: A little world generator tool that creates continents from rock you draw on the planet's core.

name: Aledorn
summary: Spiritual successor to many old school hard-core RPG/Dungeon masterpieces, that combines tactical combat system, exploration in the first person view and intriguing travelling system between main map locations.

name: Alchemy 1000
summary: This classic alchemy puzzle game starts off with the four basic elements - Air, Water, Earth and Fire. Mix them together and create new elements. Make Santa Claus, a crocodile, a skeleton, sushi, or an elephant! Can you create and discover all 1000 elements? This premium brain teaser provides hours of exploration, creativity and fun. Play and share your progress with your friends. Caution - this game is addictive, and could keep you busy all day! :)

name: Alley Cat
summary: Originally Espi produced this map back in 2003 to Sarge Baldy's speedmapping session. Sarge Baldy then spent a few hours revising it and it became a tribute map to Espi.

name: AL: A Choose Your Own Adventure
All Aboard!: The Microgauge Train Set
Alien Frontier
summary: Alien Frontier is an open world, third-person shooter roguelite. Explore, search, and mine resources in the deadly alien wilderness... assuming you can survive combat with hordes of bloodthirsty aliens. Collect loot and upgrades to become the most dangerous (and wealthy) prospector in the galaxy!

name: All-Inn
summary: An unusual inn simulator fit on a single screen.

name: All You Can Shoot
summary: All You Can Shoot is a 2D shooting arena game, where the player will be thrown into several levels and settings.

name: Albert's Ark Idle
summary: Albert’s Ark is a 2D clicker/idle game where you upgrade buildings, play mini-games, make money, sail the seven seas, and revive fantastic mythical creatures to bring magic to the kingdom.

name: Alec Adventure
summary: Alec Adventure is a casual 2D pixel platformer. Shoot your crossbow as you travel through different environments fighting many different enemies. Find your way back home with items you find and don't forget to enjoy the view on the way!

name: Alchemy Emporium
summary: Alchemy Emporium is a fantasy management game, where you play as a promising alchemist in a dynamic world with procedurally generated potions.

name: Alchementalist
summary: Alchementalist is a procedurally generated rogue-lite dungeon crawler featuring spell-crafting. Fight your way through hordes of enemies, mine elemental nodes for materials and craft spell boosts, or even totally new spells, that allow you to manipulate the elements any way you choose!

name: Alcohol Empire
summary: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents!

name: Alex Gordon
summary: Alex Gordon is a fedora-wearing feline. Help this fabulous cat travel five dazzling game worlds as he collects coins and boxes the bad guys. Alex Gordon must explore every nook and cranny to save his sister from the cunning Monkey King. Will he find the scattered pieces of an ancient amulet before his nemesis releases his sibling? Grab your satchel and take a leap into the nocturnal wonderful world of Alex Gordon in this hissing Adventure.

name: Alpine Crawler World
summary: Alpine Crawler World is an Off Road simulation with real time physics, weather effects, different cars and tracks to choose and much more.

name: Alias
summary: Alias is an abstract game designed for a company of at least 4 people. This is exactly what will help to distract yourself from the external fuss. Guess the guessing word through associations and explanations. Spend time playing in the same room, or play it online from a distance.

name: Alister In Wonderland
summary: Welcome to wonderland, a place of dreams. Take on the role of Alister Hinch and go on a journey through this surreal realm of enchantment and wonder. Experience making friends in this realm... Now, what ending will you choose to have?

name: All Star Pro Wrestling II
summary: For many wrestling, the desire to see "Misawa (NOAH) vs Mutoh (NJPW)", "Akiyama (NOAH) vs Nagata (NJPW)" or "Hashimoto (ZERONE) vs Kobashi (NOAH)" was all but a distant dream that goes beyond the framework of the organization fixtures. But this is the reality in the ring of "ASPW2"! No longer is there walls between the organization, the time to fight is now!

name: Alf Jonatahn y la máscara de Siwa
summary: Alf is on a mission to travel to Egypt and recover a golden mask. To do so, he will have to deal with old acquaintances and a mysterious sect.

name: Al's Weather Rokies
summary: Help Al Roker wake up!

name: Alpaca Run
summary: Alpaca Run is a cross between a runner game and a music video for the song "Transcontinental Alpaca."

name: A Little to the Left: Merry Mess
summary: Merry Mess event unwraps five new puzzles between 22-26 December

name: All-in-One Mahjong
summary: Mahjong from Pozirk Games Inc. Object is to clear all pieces from the board matching tiles.

name: Alula
summary: Alula is a 2.5DHD puzzle game where you help people solve their problems by exploring parts of their psyche.

name: Alfred's Adventure
summary: Alfred's Adventure is an Action game, developed by Mobius Entertainment and published by SCi, which was released in Europe in 2000.

name: Alien Girl
summary: ZX Spectrum Game inspired in Aliens Movies.

name: Alakenisland
summary: Explore the island, fight off the pirates in Action RPG style, evade attacks, play online or locally with your friends, strategize your items for maximum combat damage, drive a boat armored with a cannon and sink the Pirate Ship!

name: Almost Home Now
summary: A 10 minute horror experience of a girl walking home alone at night.

name: Alice Mystery Garden
summary: Join Alice, who has wandered into the wondrous land of Alice Mystery Garden, to overcome adversity in this VR action-puzzle game. Control Alice's movements while switching back and forth between a top-down player perspective and Alice's in-world perspective to collect scattered looking-glass fragments and clear each stage.

name: Alexey's Dwice
summary: A puzzle game from Alexey Pajitnov, creator of Tetris. Players match ice blocks of the same shape to stop an avalanche from destroying the village at the base of the mountain.

name: Alice in Wonderland AR quest D
Alternative Girls
summary: Alternative Girls is a Japanese mobile game created by CyberAgent, Inc. for iOS, Android and PC. It is a turn-based strategy RPG where beautiful girls do battle, each with their own unique animated special moves. Players can also enjoy fully voiced stories, including special VR experiences.

name: AlexCity 1: Bank Heist
summary: A city at night themed level

name: Alien Wipeout
summary: Duke takes the spaceship and starts his long way to the alien base. After three days in there, he finally looks at some strange organic structure. "Where the hell did they send me to?" says duke. "Bah, there is no time to waste!". So he gets inside the mothership and prepares his gun to kick some alien ass!

name: Alone
summary: Alone is a 9 map limit removing episode for Doom 2 by various members of Doomer Boards. Shout out to @xvertigox for his first DBP as project lead, and @gaspe and @Jaws In Space for their DBP debuts!

name: Aletta
summary: An adventure visual novel with a pixel art style. About ghosts, past love, and a world of the unconscious.

name: Alchera
summary: Alchera A Struggle for Life steward in an alternate universe, sees a portal at the end of the cave during an operation, wondering and approaching the steward. He enters the portal and finds himself in an age where god and his soldiers rule the earth, his goal is to find the portal and save himself.

name: Almistice
summary: Almistice (obvious pun intended) is a ten map vanilla episode that tries to celebrate the influence of one of the greatest mappers of the 00s. The wad was started during a period of uncertainty before the Rusty Drill project was created. As such I vowed to finish this off to 10 maps (2 sets of 5 maps each culminating in a death exit on the final map of the set, the first five are space base and the second five take a darker/gothic theme, think a weird cult group with access to tech theme, crudely like Europa3.wad)

name: Alien Monopoly
summary: In different worlds, different groups of people compete for wealth and become the last strong.

name: All Grown Up!: Express Yourself
summary: Finally a game made just for girls! Help Angelica with the school newspaper, sing a song with Susie, put together stylin' outfits with Lil, swap information with your best friends, take a vote on a hot topic or use the PDS function to plan your busy week!

name: Alpha Chimp: Episode 1 - The Jungle
summary: Alpha Chimp is an action game where you play as a chimp and complete missions to finally challenge the current Alpha. Explore 3D environments and battle other chimp tribes, poachers, loggers and even aliens! The extra "Battle Mode" allows you to select what kind of enemy and what kind of scene you want to battle in, for quick fun mindless play. Try it NOW!

name: Aloha Play
summary: Time 2 minutes! Players Are You Ready to Help Princess Reila grab all the chickens and become master chicken?

name: Alienautics
summary: Play as an Alienautics Space Force Agent to rescue the abducted crew members of your Mothership from the volcanic planet Luminus Prime.

name: Alone Among the Stars: Twine Edition
summary: Explore space

name: Alley Master
summary: A bowling game from Cinematronics.

name: Alice in Videoland
summary: Adaption of the famous Alice in Wonderland stories.

name: All Systems Dance
summary: Automation is not the answer; DANCE is the key to disruption! Help liberate citizens of a consumption-obsessed, corporate dystopia in All Systems Dance: an expressive dance battle adventure. Connect moves, express yourself, feel the music. Join The Movement. The revolution will not be choreographed.

name: Alchemania
summary: Alchemania is a pixel arcade platformer with a side view. This is a reaction game - you need to press button at the correct time.

name: Alchemist's Secret
summary: Become an Alchemist ready to make lots and lots of potions! Use your knowledge to sort every potion you can, and make sure to satisfy yourself after every completion. How many potions can you sort?

name: Alpha Blaster
summary: Space shooter.

name: Almirante Graf Spee
summary:
El juego está basado en los archivos de los hechos ocurridos a la expedición suicida "Graf Spee" en el Atlántico Norte y Sur. Un pixel intermitente te indicará en el tablero la presencia de barcos enemigos en el Atlántico. El año es 1940, como capitán del Almirante Graf Spee, tu tarea será hundir los barcos enemigos, utilizando para ello tus 6 cañones de 11" y los torpedos. Patrulla la zona, localiza el barco y utilizando los instrumentos a tu disposiciónm que incluyen velocidades variables, posibilidad de dar la vuelta, combustible, distancia del objetivo, estado de munición y torpedos, maniobras dentro del campo de visión para atacar. Pero el enemigo puede tomar acción evasiva. Recargar el combustible te pondrá en una posición vulnerable y los cruceros y barcos de querra británicos tratarán de destruirte. Para que tu búsqueda y persecución sea un reto constante, los barcos enemigos cambian de posición mientras recargas el combustible. 
 
Hay 7 niveles de dificultad que van desde FACIL a CASI IMPOSIBLE. Al principio, la pantalla te mostrará un mapa del Atlántico Sur para que localkices el objetivo, pulsando "S=SEARCH" la pantalla te mostrará el área local donde se encuentra el navío enemigo. Cuando estés en el área de fuego, la pantalla te mostrará el objetivo que ha sido destruido (si le has alcanzado), así como tus propios daños.

name: Altered Beast
summary: The LCD version of Altered Beast is a watered-down version of the arcade game Altered Beast created by Tiger Electronics.

name: Alien Tag
summary: Alien Tag is an free, immersive VR game that puts you in the shoes of an extraterrestrial trying to tag other aliens!

name: A Little Bus Stop
summary: A small game about a couple waiting at a bus stop, made over the course of about 3 or 4 days.

name: Alpha Betty and Friends
summary: An educational game aimed at younger children.

name: ALF: The First Adventure
summary: ALF must collect parts of his spacecraft in this top-down action game.

name: Alawishus Pixel
summary: A puzzle platformer for Xbox Live Indie games, where the goal is to reach the door in each level.

name: Alice in Wonderdream
summary: Obviously based on Alice in Wonderland, Fushigi no Yume no Alice is a cute and colourful platform romp. You adventure through forests, caves, castles and such, defeating the many enemies by letting out a loud scream that shoots across the screen. The scream can be powered up by holding down the button, but leave it too long and you'll get out of breath and stand there panting, defenseless for a few moments. Aside from your voice, you can also jump on enemies to dispatch them. As you progress through the stages (each with a boss at the end of course) you also gain magic powers in the form of books. By pushing RUN then selecting your power with BUTTON I, you get the chance to do such things as show hidden power-ups and become invincible for a short time.

name: Aliens and Umbrellas
summary: Shoot Aliens with Umbrellas and other Aliens

name: Alien Squatter
summary: You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.

name: Alan and the kid
summary: VR versus PC. Big VS Small ! Get the drop on your opponent using Guns, Rockets, Traps, Sleeper agents and a variety of other methods.Alan is a self-aware pawn on the Kids play table. Jetpacks, Oil slicks, smoke grenades, Table manipulation, Use every item at your disposal!

name: All Star Pro-Wrestling
summary: The breathtaking realism is the ultimate goal! The warriors of the ring will capture your imagination and come to life. Square has entered the arena of professional wrestling, and it will shock you and bring you into the action!

name: Altiverse
summary: As one of the remaining survivors of the collapse, take your final stand and rebel against the AI and their creations who control, manipulate, and rule the Altiverse, before it’s too late...

name: Alien Hominid: PDA Games
summary: A standalone release of Alien Hominid's popular mini-games

name: Alone and Dangerous
summary: Alone and Dangerous is a 3D action shooter in the setting of a zombie apocalypse. Controlling an armed soldier, you confront the constantly arriving forces of zombies. Collect experience points, upgrade your weapon, and continue on!

name: Alpha-Major
summary: 1 map designed for Dsda-Doom 0.19.7 complevel 9. Made as a sort of spiritual successor to MrZzul's Dimensions Map03.

name: All Evil Night 2
summary: This is a next story about a cop who witnessed strange events near the city Evilween. You will meet monsters from your nightmares.

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 3
summary: Map Pack 3 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: Altarays
summary: Would you like to try out an extrasensory experience based on real events? Enjoy your first out-of-body experience in virtual reality. During this first out-of-body experience you’ll travel back to Egypt. But not the Egypt they told you about in history books, definitely not.

name: Alien Planet
summary: This level takes place on an alien planet which must be liberated from aliens

name: Alien Nah'Topsy
summary:
Destroy the Evidence!

Evade the authorities by helping our little dude push the alien DNA evidence into the garbage and escape into his UFO.

name: A Land Goo's Crazy
summary: A hard platformer roguelite game whit manny RNG. Upgrades, skill improvements, Area- and Bossfights.

name: Albedo and Cast of the Seven Godsends
summary: Cast of the Seven Godsends harks back to the days when classic 2D, run ’n gun, action-shooter games ruled the arcades.

name: Alice is Dead: Episode 1
summary:
You've arrived in Wonderland, that's good. Alice is dead, that's bad. You don't know who you are, that's the worst.

Do you have what it takes to get out of Wonderland, and more importantly, figure out who you are?
Just a note, this game is unappologetically hard with some of the puzzles. It's a puzzle game, it's not meant to be easy. However, SHOULD you need help, there is a friendly walkthrough button right in the game.

name: All I Wanted Was a Bouncy Ball
summary: Escape from a relentless lab monster.

name: All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution
summary: All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution (オール仮面ライダー ライダーレボリューション Ōru Kamen Raidā Raidā Reboryūshon) is the sequel to the DS video game All Kamen Rider: Rider Generation 2 and the third in the All Kamen Rider Series of games. This game was released on December 1, 2016 for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Alarameth TD
summary: A unique, dynamic, challenging, fully-voiced tower defence game for Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. You begin at a small outpost at the edge of the human lands, and proceed to the elven, dwarven, and gnomish realms in an effort to save the lands of Alarameth from certain annihilation.

name: All Your Time-Tossed Selves
summary: a short story made in Google Forms

name: Altwaldheim 2: Town in Trouble
summary: Become the mayor in this medieval-inspired rogue-like fantasy city builder. Take control of the treacherous city council. Build settlements, boost the economy, and explore the nearby dungeons! Transform Altwaldheim into a thriving metropolis and win in auto battles against your opponents!

name: Alice in Wonderland: 3D Game
summary: The adventures of Alice in wonderland have not finished yet. It is time to help her! Alice is trapped in the labyrinth of wonderland.

name: Alien Invasion
summary: Alien Invasion is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. It was created by Fred Hero and released on June 16th, 1999. It contains new levels, new graphics (including graphics from Wolfenstein 3D, Doom, Doom II, Shadow Warrior, Blood, and Rise of the Triad: Dark War) new voice-overs (including voice-overs from Shadow Warrior), and new music (including music from Doom, Shadow Warrior, Blood, and Rise of the Triad: Dark War).

name: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
summary: Dungeon crawler RPG in which you set out to save the Sultan's daughter.

name: Alcarys Complex
summary: A narrative focused, character driven, 2D RPG for the PC presented in a similar style of retro pixel art RPG's of the past.

name: Alone Journey
summary: Alone Journey is simple casual platformer. Jump to the sky, kill the skeletons, and try not to...

name: All is Lost
summary: In the distant future, mankind is scattered across a vast and dangerous universe. The crews of massive space stations live in a constant struggle for survival. How many can you save?

name: Alpiner
summary:
Alpiner is a third-person action game in which the player's goal is to climb safely to the top of various mountains. Each of the six mountains the player climbs has various obstacles which should be avoided: falling rocks, avalanches, wild animals, trees, and brush fires can all hinder progress. Being hit by these obstacles will cause the player to lose progress, falling down part of the mountain (some obstacles cause a short falling distance, others a long distance).

Should the player fall all of the way to the bottom of the mountain a life will be lost. To help anticipate obstacles, voice synthesis provide a warning when danger is near. Each mountain has a time limit in which it must be climbed, though the timer only counts down when the climber isn't moving. As the player progresses through the levels the mountains become higher and obstacles become faster and more numerous.

name: Always Forward
summary: A very short tap-and-jump game.

name: All of Zhem
summary: You as a agent against hundreds of zombies that can run and climb and always be chasing after you till you become one of Zhem. Navigate through 3 different maps to wipe out every single one of Zhem.

name: A Lucky First Turnabout: A Klavier Gavin Story
summary: In an alternate universe where Klavier Gavin is the rookie defense attorney and Apollo Justice is the genius prosecutor...

name: Album Club: Mune Kyun Saint Paulia Jogakuin
Alyosha Popovich i Tugarin Zmej
summary: Alyosha Popovich i Tugarin Zmej is a colorful and light-hearted point-and-click adventure based on the Russian hit animated film of the same name which features popular characters from Russian folk epics. The player controls Alyosha Popovich, the youngest of three Russian Bogatyrs (warrior heroes). Alyosha with the help of his mentor Tikhon and a talking horse (which also serves as a comic relief), along with other characters from the film, must return the gold stolen by Tugarin's horde. Along with typical point-and-click gameplay there are some puzzles and brief arcade scenes. The game is abundant with elements of Russian folklore.

name: Altidudes
summary: Get your skateboard ready, you are about to climb the tallest mountain in the whole world! With a seemingly infinite height, you can climb as high as you want, but will you ever reach the top?? Pixel graphics! Dude references! Skateboards! A big mountain! We got it all!

name: Alien Attack
summary: The 17th Title included in Action 32 for Mega Drive/Genesis. A belt-scrolling shooter in which the player must proceed to the right, while defeating the aliens who are trying to take the world.

name: Allwheel.online
summary: Allwheel.online gives the player the opportunity to feel like a rally car pilot, as well as independently or in company with friends to overcome off-road relying on their skills and mutual assistance.

name: Alien Planet Bell
summary:
Zean, the alien, has only one goal in this strategy game: Reach the bell. His mission starts out simple. A simple world with only him and a bell. There is nothing more. How will he reach it?

It is up to you, the player, to figure out what Zean has to do to reach the bell.

A game that started out as a game created for a game jam, now fully playable.

name: Altered Beast: Guardian of the Realms
summary: Zeus, creator and ruler of the Guardians of the Gates, raises you from your grave! You must go fourth and defeat a new, unknown evil that has destroyed the Guardians and ravaged the universe. To do so, you must collect the keys and Essence of each land, transforming you into beasts with unnatural powers and special abilities. Conquer this evil and you will become the sole Guardian, the protector of the universe.

name: Alchemage
summary: You accidently stepped into a mysterious land and started an epic adventure only to return home. You build shelters, explore biomes, fight with monsters, and discover ancient ruins to uncover the myth of the world.

name: All-Star Watersports
summary:
All Star Watersports lets you 'Ride-the-Barrel' through the most realistic waves yet seen on PlayStation. Grab a surfboard, bodyboard, windsurfer or jet watercraft and carve up some of the most awesome surfing beaches along the coast.

Play with the seagulls and dolphins as you master the skills required for each sport including barrel surfing the surfboard, jibbing the windsurfer, jumping the watercraft and spinning the bodyboard.

You can compete against the computer or up to four players can compete in contests including 'Beach Competition', 'Big Air Contests' and 'Extreme Trick'.

name: Alkaline
summary:
Alkaline is a Quake 1 mod & map pack, based on Rubicon 2 by metlslime.
Alkaline greatly expands the enemy roster & adds additional weapons and features to the Quake base game.

name: Alien Panic!
summary:
The aliens are invading! As the Alien Buster, it's your mission to protect the solar system.
In this action-puzzle game, players eliminate incoming aliens by firing custom-shaped blocks from the bottom screen to fill gaps on the top screen. Unlike traditional puzzle games with fixed block shapes, Alien Panic allows players to freely draw block forms using a touchscreen grid.

name: Alfapet
summary: An early regional CD-i release to Sweden with what looks to be a conversion of the popular board game scrabble.

name: Alpha One
summary: Arcade shooter developed in 1988 by Vision Electronics.

name: A Lil' Horror Story: The Camp Fire
summary: You got a voucher for a free camping trip, sponsored by The Bank!! YAY!! Time to enjoy the nice outdoors... Good thing boogeymen and monsters don't exist... Heh... Do they?... Collect 12 logs to get through the night...Camp fires are safe... Crouch to be silent...Your Flashlight attracts them...

name: AlterEgo
summary: You control a hero who has a phantom twin, his alter ego

name: Alan Probe: Amateur Surgeon
summary: A browser and iOS game by Adult Swim that rather loosely simulates the art of surgery.

name: All-Star Baseball 2001
summary:
The last All-Star Baseball release on the N64 once again includes some new features as well as improvements in relation to previous play modes & options. For 2001, a new team is included, The Coopertown Legends, featuring a selection of some of the finest players to ever grace the MLB, including Yogi Berra, Willie Stargell and Reggie Jackson.
Along with the legends team, you can choose from every player, team and stadium from the real 2000 MLB season. Each player includes facial expressions and looks inspired to realism, plus motion-captured player movements, batting stances and reactions to key events during play.

name: Alchedungeon
summary: Alchedungeon is an action-roguelike where reactions is a key to survive in abandoned dungeon. Mix gases, liquids and potions, combine effects of spell gems, elements and artifacts, adapt to strengths and weaknesses of enemies and environment to get a chance for your success

name: Alignment
summary: A challenging and engaging puzzle game that will require you to move colored objects and place them on their respective platforms to explore through a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: Alex Hunter: Lord of the Mind HD
Alexandra Ledermann 4: Adventures at stud
summary: Alexandra Ledermann 4: Adventures at the Stud, or simply Alexandra Ledermann 4 is a horse riding video game developed by Lexis Numérique, published by Ubisoft, and published in November 2003, on PC. It belongs to the Alexandra Ledermann series.

name: Alcyon Infinity
summary: Destroy hordes of ever-improving enemies and their Mothership. Alcyon Infinity is a fast shooter/bullet hell with dynamic movement and risk management. Up to 4 Co-Op players with Controllers.

name: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview
summary: Alcheverse: Shadow from Gladview is an unique mix of AutoBattler & Crafting games. Explore an ever-changing map, gather strange ingredients and mix them together to craft Alcheverse: powerful creatures born from alchemy! Let them fight for you in strategic automatic battles and save Gladview!

name: Alveron: Withering Roots
summary: Dive into the magical realm of Lyhjem and help save the World Tree. In "Alveron" you take on the role of Valec, who is drawn from the human world into the world of the Alveri.

name: Alnory
summary: Alnory is a SRPG from developer Avavi.

name: Alpine Crawler Ultimate
summary: Alpine Crawler Ultimate (AC Ultimate) is an Off Road simulation which contains two games: AC World and AC Wild with some additional features.

name: Allura: The Three Realms
summary: In the second part of the great match3 serial, Allura and Glenn learn of a great conflict between the realms of the sea, earth, and sky. They must set out on a new journey, one to bring peace between the kingdoms and restore the balance of the realms.

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 8
summary: Map Pack 8 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 6 DM maps.

name: Alterhavoc
summary: Alterhavoc is a Rogue-like Bullet hell game where players have to survive and fight monsters with an Inventory system where the resources can be arranged in a limited area to receive additional buffs.

name: Alternative Punishment
summary: As a result of a petty crime, the protagonist of this adult visual novel, is sentenced to serve a week in a military camp. The situation seems dramatic, but something very peculiar changes everything: in the military camp there are only female soldiers.

name: Aliens versus Predator
summary:
Aliens versus Predator offers three separate campaigns, each playable as a separate species: Alien, Predator, or human Colonial Marine. Each player character has different objectives, abilities, and weapons. The single-player campaign presents the player with a conventional series of levels to progress through that are designed around the abilities of each character.

As the Colonial Marine the player uses a number of weapons to combat Aliens and Predators. The marine wears armor for protection and uses an image intensifier and flares to improve visibility in dark areas.

When playing as the Predator the player uses a variety of weapons from the Predator films such as wrist blades, a throwing disc, and shoulder-mounted energy weapons. The Predator is the most durable of the three player characters and can survive falls from greater heights than the human. The player can use a cloaking device to become invisible and several different modes of vision to detect enemies, including an infrared vision mode and a mode sensitive to electrical systems.

As an Alien the player can explore most of the game's environments freely, even climbing across walls and ceilings. The Alien has no weapons, however, using its claws, tail, and jaws to attack enemies. The screen is distorted into a fish eye lens effect to reflect the Alien's field of view. The player can also use a form of echolocation in dark areas and can detect pheromones to discern human or Predator enemies. The Alien can drop from any height without injury and is the fastest of the three player characters.

Several bonus levels allow each player character access to portions of the missions of the other characters. To allow the marine and Predator characters to traverse through the areas of the Alien missions, the player is supplied with a jet pack for the marine and a grappling hook for the Predator.

name: Albatross
summary: Albatross offers a captivating golf experience from a top-down perspective, featuring a challenging 18-hole course. Players can customize their play by choosing from 14 different clubs, including drivers, irons, and a putter. Fine-tune your game with options to adjust your stance, control how you strike the ball, and perfect your swing. The game uniquely presents a split-screen layout, providing both an overhead view of the entire hole and a close-up look at your ball's position. A status bar includes all the essential information you need during play. Enjoy various gameplay modes such as single-player stroke play, multiplayer stroke play, or multiplayer match play.

name: All Things Devours
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction. Is on the list Interactive Fiction Top 50 of all time (2015 edition).

name: Alpine Lake
summary: Kick back in the fresh mountain air and craft your ideal haven on the shores of Alpine Lake! Build, and decorate your inn to bring joy and prosperity to the community. Welcome guests to your cozy escape in the woods. Farm, cook, and entertain them in your own unique way!

name: AlienRun
summary: AlienRun is a funny platformer, the main character is a little green alien your task is: take all the coins, avoid enemies and lead it to the end! If you want you can play with your controller!!!

name: A Letter to You!
summary: A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story!

name: Alex and the Aliens
summary: In ALEX AND THE ALIENS: Collapse of Time, you play as Alex, a survivor in a world ravaged by an alien invasion. Navigate a devastated Earth, battle deadly enemies, and make critical choices that will determine the fate of humanity. Can you stop the collapse, or will you risk rewriting the future?

name: Alt Tarot
summary: an unnaturally augmented tarot deck in twine

name: Allergenium
summary: Allergenium it’s not a typical survival game. The world created has a unique aspect which has destroyed most of the humanity. You're one of the few who survived the new face of destruction – ALLERGY!

name: Alpine Racer
summary: Alpine Racer is a 3D Alpine skiing arcade game released by Namco in 1995. It features downhill and gate with three courses and two play modes - Race and Time Attack. The player stands on a set of ski-like foot stands while holding onto two bars for stability to play.

name: Altorius
summary: Altorius combines 2D twin-stick action with platforming, puzzles and more. Includes two full gameplay modes for near-endless gameplay.

name: Almond Ridge
summary: A short visual novel roleplaying game set in a nursing home where the residents have been going missing.

name: All That Remains: A story about a child's future
summary: The game tells a story about the childhood from the perspective of a child. You find Diary entries from your own diary that you have not yet written.

name: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth
summary: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth is an upcoming sequel to Alien Holocaust, developed by Fernando Rodrigues Salvio and published by Bitnamic Software.

name: Alien Shooter 2: New Era
summary: A desert, an abandoned city, cramped underground corridors of MAGMAs research centers, and for hundreds of kilometers around there is only darkness and thousands of monsters coming from all sides. You have only two options - to achieve your goal or die.

name: Aliens Versus Predator: Extinction
summary: Aliens Versus Predator: Extinction is a real-time strategy game featuring three different species, all vying for control of the planet LV-742. Players can command an elite force of Colonial Marines, stalk their prey as a member of the Predator clan, or scurry along in packs as the acid-spitting Aliens. Gameplay involves advancing through a series of missions ranging in locale from jungles and caverns to futuristic battlefields and space colonies. Each faction offers ten types of combat units that can be upgraded over time with new attributes or equipment specific to the species. Predators, for instance, increase their number of vision modes, Aliens impregnate their victims with facehuggers, while Colonial Marines receive new weapon enhancements. As in titles like StarCraft, units range in scope from standard grunts and infantry to specialized forces and massive troop transports.

name: Al Fine
summary:
In this world, three races — humans, sprites, and kindred — coexist with their own unique cultures. Some races are on good terms with each other, such as humans and sprites, while others may not get along as well, such as sprites and kindred, but they all live together more or less harmoniously.

Nowhere is that cooperative attitude more apparent than here in the most commercially-developed town on the archipelago, Notte Luce.

The tale about to be told is about a boy named Louis and his experiences in Notte Luce.

name: Alpine Ski III
summary: A simple yet addictive 3D Ski game with 11 different levels!

name: A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars
summary: Seeing Stars is all about multiple solutions, with 100 stars to discover across 38 playful puzzles, and some extra cute visitors too.

name: Always the Same Nightmare
summary: A fast, dynamic die-and-retry style platformer with varied levels and gameplay. Is a passage too difficult? Stop time! Is a boss too strong? Gain experience and upgrade your weapons! Can you escape this dark and perilous dungeon?

name: A Living Room
summary: You are a man in a room. Something feels off. Or maybe it's on. A short existential comedy point-and-click non-adventure about the limitations and imitations of human existence – or, really, whatever you want it to be about.

name: A Lose Hero in the Castle of the Succubi
summary: In this game, you will explore the Demon Castle by manipulating the characters in the pixel art. Walk around the various parts of the Demon Castle and talk to Succubus.

name: Altars of Madness
summary: Altars of Madness is a set of 12 Doom 2 maps in Boom format created by me over the course of a few months. The target source port is prboom+ but we tested in a variety of sourceports. The maps are relatively small and can be beaten in under 10 minutes. Each map is designed to be pistol started, and a death exit is placed at the end of each map to force this (sorry continuous players).

name: Always 1-1
summary: Search for "anomalies" in a 2D platformer

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Collector's Edition
summary:
Buckle up, soldier! Welcome to Aliens: Colonial Marines. Created by Gearbox, the critically acclaimed and fan-favorite developers of Borderlands and Brothers In Arms, you and your friends will become the most badass military outfit in the galaxy – the US Colonial Marines. It’s up to you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno infestation.

The Collector's Edition Pack includes:

- Plasma Pulse Rifle - This special rifle fires charged balls of plasma annihilating any enemies caught in its path.
- Sonic Electronic Ball Breakers - Landing on the floor, this special, high-tech grenade bounces several feet into the air before unleashing a large electrical charge that fries anything in the vicinity.
- US Colonial Marines Academy firing range - Test your speed and accuracy with any gun in different scenarios & navigate multi-room obstacle courses, set on the U.S.S. Sephora, with enemy and innocent civilians targets.

name: Alite
summary: "Alite" is a Space Trading and Exploration Game.

name: Aladin & the Enchanted Lamp
summary: The fabulous tale of Aladin completely revised!

name: AlphaLink
summary: AlphaLink is a new multiplayer shooter based off the Kova sci-fi back story. Compete in local or online PVP matches, talk to NPCs in the hub about lore and upcoming events, customize your character, and take part in the global faction leaderboard! AlphaLink will continuously live with new updates giving fresh new features!

name: Allura: Curse of the Mermaid
summary: Help the mermaid Allura to find all clues to solve her mysterious origin in this amazing underwater Match3 adventure!

name: A Lost Room
summary: A Lost Room is an escape game without the boundaries of real world, powered by VR. In a place where anything can happen, what will you do to escape this huge complex alive?

name: Always in Mind
summary: A story-rich adventure set in the mind of a young boy named Teddy. Embark on a surreal journey across breathtaking mindscapes as you unlock unbelievable powers and forge an unlikely bond with an AI companion named "Proxy."

name: Alpha One
summary: Alpha One is a turn based strategy game with real time encounters. Each action level is a turn in a strategic conflict to survive or defeat your opponent. Race to collect resources, acquire upgrades, expand territory and economy, build defenses, all to defeat the enemy or escape home.

name: Alpha & Beta
summary: Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time

name: Alchemist of Pipiforest
summary: Alchemist of Pipiforest is a fantasy RPG game where you collect items and perform alchemy. Explore new areas, collect mysterious materials, and solve various quests. A variety of exciting episodes await you.

name: Alter
summary:
Grow and shrink the world around you in this light-hearted puzzle platformer.

Planets collide and our intrepid little hero finds himself with the power to grow and shrink the world around him. Will he use his new power for good or evil? Will he be AWESOME or like-totally-super-lame? Can you get all four different endings?

name: ALC no 10-Punkan Eigo Master: Chuukyuu
summary: An edutainment game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Alolan Volcanic Panic
summary: A Pokemon browser game where you attack falling rocks with the Alolan starter Pokemon.

name: All Evil Night
summary:
This is a story about a cop who witnessed strange events near the city Evilween. 
You will meet monsters from your nightmares.

name: Alfabit Gonki za Poteryannymi Bukvami (Byez Peklamy)
Alice in Wonderland: Puzzle Golf Adventures
summary: Don’t be late and get ready for the most eclectic and eccentric Puzzle Golf Adventure, Alice’s Wonderland has even seen! You are the ball! Go down the rabbit hole in over 70+ clever and sometimes diabolical puzzle levels. Aim, roll and explore the fantastical world of Alice’s Puzzle Golf Adventures, inspired by the famous Lewis Carroll novels. The Mad Hatter awaits! Or will chasing the White Rabbit drive you mad in the process?!

name: Alien AI
summary: An Alien AI came to Earth 20 years ago. We believed it was the greatest event in human history. The Alien AI offered us all the knowledge and technology it had. All we had to do was to help it recover and give it resources. We did.. It took over the world and enslaved us. Help us shut it down.

name: Alien3: The Gun
summary: Using cabinet mounted guns you and another player blast away the Aliens in an attempt to save the prison planet. You are also given a limited number of grenades to use when the going gets tough. The gameplay is very close to Sega’s other lightgun games from the period such as Gunblade and Jurassic Park. This game was based on the movie of the same name.

name: AloneGuy
summary: AloneGuy is a 2D game in which you have to control the character on a small island, you can jump in four directions and if you make all your efforts, you can adjust to the rhythm of the game and jump over the pesky crabs in time.

name: All Hit All Her: Western City
summary: With all hit all her: western city, the adventure continues with all its excitement. With this dlc, you will fight against bandits trying to take over your city in the wild west lands.

name: Alien Robot Monsters
summary:
Epic sci-fi tower defense action with 16-bit era look and feel, pitching your colonists against an almost endless horde of hostile alien robots who strongly oppose your attempts of colonizing their planet!

Deluxe version includes the soundtrack!

name: Allez Raconte
summary: Perhaps you have tried to tell a beautiful story of princes and princesses to your offspring to help him find the arms of Morpheus. And maybe you wiped out a ruthless "you tell badly" or "it's still the same story". Allez Raconte proposes to take over by giving a playful side to the stories via mini-games for the little ones.

name: Alien X
summary: Scientists in Sector 8 have opened a portal to another dimension. A dimension that's filled with hellish, homicidal aliens who have entered the ship and killed the entire crew. Carefully weave your way through the space station, and try to stay alive in this impressive, first-person shooter game.

name: Alexander: The Heroes Hour
summary: Alexander: The Heroes Hour is a tactical game where players command a squad of heroes across a grid-based battlefield. It blends strategic positioning, character progression, and skill combos with a story-driven campaign, featuring permadeath options, varied enemy types, and equipment customization.

name: Alea Jacta Est: Birth of Rome
summary: Birth of Rome offers a level of historical accuracy and detail never reached before in a video game. Birth of Rome is a true simulation where players are challenged to create armies and fleets, organize and maneuver them, sustain and reinforce them. All the time taking into account military, economic, political and diplomatic parameters.

name: Alpine
summary: Alpine is a Skiing Arcade Game where your objective is to avoid rocks and other skiers while zooming down a mountain at lightning fast speeds! Collect power ups to help you on your mission to conquer the mountain! Collect coins to purchase new gear from Badger's shop!

name: All Fall Down
summary: Set in a distant future world, this is a unique first person shooter/platform/puzzle game where you need to find out why all the debris is falling and save your world from destruction.

name: Alien Up
summary: Fast-paced survival shooter where space mechanic Chelsea Crisp fights off hordes of alien invaders. Upgrade, jump, dodge, and blast your way through many levels of this humorous 90's style anime pixel adventure.

name: Almost
summary: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride with a first-person speedrun game that demands lightning-fast decision-making skills. Are you prepared to push your abilities to the limit and achieve the almost perfect run?

name: Alacrity Golf
summary: A golf game that takes place on a set of mini-golf courses. The player plays the game by swinging the controller.

name: AlleZ
summary: Fight fencing duels against forlorn foes in a forgotten forest.

name: All-Star Air Hockey
summary: Remember the days of hanging around the local arcade and playing air hockey until the wee hours?

name: Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX: Signature Edition
Alex Kidd: High-Tech World
summary: Life isn't always easy for the Crown Prince of Radactian. When the High-Tech World arcade opened up, someone in your castle tore the map into eight pieces! But it's such a cool arcade, you have to go there. It's a challenge worthy of any Kidd!

name: Alien Battle Champions
summary: Collect and enslave alien creatures. Increase your creatures skills by gaining experience from battles. Collect resources to craft armor and nanites so that you can collect even more creatures. Battle other players online and become the champion.

name: Aladdin 2000
summary: Aladdin 2000 is a port of Disney's Aladdin for the Sega Mega Drive, made for the SNES presumably by DVS Electronic Co.. The music comes from the official licensed SNES game by Capcom.

name: Alcatraz Harry
summary: You have to escape from a prison camp.

name: AlchePot
summary: A fantastic but difficult Bullet Hell. Shoot enemies all around. Experience the unique 'Bullet Absorb' system by stop firing, change threaten to your energy. Get ability upgrade through 8 levels with well-designed atmosphere.

name: All New Origins
summary: Small scaled "Mini" Fantasy RPG where you create your own character, remember forgotten spells, find new mystical items, and have the chance to experience multiple paths and endings in the game.

name: Alparslan
summary: Alparslan is Turkey's first RPG Themed, Open World Mafia game. Growing up in the seediest underworld, Alparslan vows to fight all his enemies until he becomes the most respected bully in Ankara. An action game with a Deep State Mafia storyline set in Ankara from a TPS perspective.

name: Alter Dogma
summary:
This RPG features a 2D dungeon that lets you explore the world and find clues regarding the Tree of Life 'Sacred Tree' by managing the Knights hired by the Order.
Decide on the Knights that you want and lead them by embarking on a journey into an unknown world!
Nurture your Knights with strength, intelligence, vitality, dexterity, agility and luck - six abilities you can distribute strategically to enjoy an extensive type of combat by using nine types of knights and specific operating skills.
Using ten different unique character-related skills and common abilities can be useful in combat.

name: Alien Shooter: Lost City
summary:
The war to save the Earth is on a full scale, severe fights are all over the planet surface.
Scientists are studying the imminent danger, but the volume of information about the monsters that we have is awfully small.
Nobody knows where did they come from, whether they have leaders and how to stop the invasion...

name: Aleph: A Life
summary: A browser-based art game made in response to Marwa Helal’s poem ")[[:”.’.,:]]( Remixed".

name: Alien Addition
summary: Alien Addition is an educational game that mixes maths problems with the gameplay of a shoot 'em up. The player controls a cannon left and right along the bottom of the screen and has to shoot down the aliens space ships that appear above him. There are five ships in a row and they slowly begin descending down the screen. Each ship has a maths problem written on it and to shoot it down the player has to enter the correct answer for the ship above him. The player is destroyed if any ship reaches the bottom. The game otherwise runs for a fixed time which can be customized by the player. Other customization options include skill level (1 to 9) and problem range (3, 6 or 9).

name: Alien Worms Invasion
summary: Alien Worms Invasion是一款未来风格的探索塔防类游戏。通过探索未知地区，建立基地，建造单位来抵御虫族进攻，最终消灭虫族。

name: Aliens on the Table
summary: Aliens on the Table is an augmented reality game,where the player shoot the aliens from the air trying to stop the invasion. Its the final Battle of the war where aliens try to send a message for their home asking for a backup through a portal which they try to build. The primary objective of the game is to stop the Aliens from sending a portal message and ultimately winning the war and you also have soldiers to fight on your side, you have the your own team to back you up and win the war against aliens.

name: Alice Into the Panopticon
summary: Guide Alice, a young girl lost in an unfamiliar and dangerous world, in her quest to return home. In this 2D action-adventure metroidvania game you will meet peculiar characters, traverse a multitude of sceneries, and fight powerful beings known as Egregores to unravel the truth.

name: Alphabear 2
summary: In Alphabear 2, you spell words by selecting letters on a puzzle grid. When you use letters that are adjacent to each other, bears appear! The more letters you use, the bigger the bear gets, and the more points you earn. Spelling words cleverly is the key to success!

name: Aliens vs. Predator Collection
summary: The Aliens vs. Predator Collection comes bundled with the Bughunt Map Pack & Swarm Map Pack DLC.

name: Alice=Alice
summary: An otome game by Rejet for PC.

name: Allblack Phase 1
summary: Allblack Phase 1 is a visual novel adapted from light novel with the same title. Follow the journey of the amnesiac and seemingly abnormal "Theodore Quentin" as he uncovers his identity while escaping from the people who wants him at all cost...

name: All in Casino Girls
summary: Hit jackpots and increase your prestige to unlock new games. Get the ladies' attention, and eventually make it to the top of the millionaire list!

name: Alligori
summary: The land of Alligori needs a new king, and you've been requested to take over your grandfathers kingdom! Build your kingdom up from a village, to a town, city, and finally a kingdom. Delve into dungeons with puzzle-themed weapons, face epic bosses, and craft rings and amulets to help along the way!

name: Alien Creeps
summary: Alien Creeps TD is a tower defense strategy game in which you have to protect the Earth from an alien invasion. You will be able to blow them up, to strike them down or to exterminate them with the help of your helicopter.

name: Alaric's Quest
summary: Alaric's Quest: Charming 2D platform game with a medieval theme and high difficulty level. Available on Linux, Windows, and SteamDeck, compatible with keyboard, controller, and touchscreen

name: Always Higher
summary: Always Higher is a single-player sci-fi adventure shooter VR game. Play as a secret agent, collect data modules, avoid enemy soldiers and escape underground facility!

name: Alien Run
summary: A long way to victory lies ahead of you. Don’t forget about the obstacles which will try to stop you from succeeding. Jump, run, crouch, and move between three layers to stay up!

name: Aligned
summary: It's the 21st century and the world has undergone vast technological advancements, making VR a second home for ordinary citizens. However, with such freedom and opportunities, not everything is as clear as it seems. An abduction takes place, and its culprit: cyber terrorists from the dark web. It’s your job to uncover the truth behind the VR world.

name: All Dogs Go to Heaven: Activity Center
summary: All Dogs Go to Heaven: Activity Center is a collection of minigames and kid-oriented activities related to the 1989 film of the same name.

name: Allison Road
summary:
Allison Road is a survival horror game developed in Unreal Engine 4, played in first person view with optional Oculus Rift support.

You will take on the role of the unnamed protagonist who wakes up one day without any recollection of prior events. Over the course of five nights It is your objective to uncover the whereabouts of your family, unravel the mysteries of the house, and face off against Lily and other dark entities that are nested deep within the house, while the clock is relentlessly ticking towards 3:00am.

What would you do if you could feel something stalking you in the dark in the safety of your own home?
If you couldn't tell what's real and what's not?

Allison Road combines old-school survival horror and adventure game mechanics with next-gen graphics and optional VR support.

The game was initially developed by one person but then the team slowly grew to its current size of 6 people.

name: Alchemia
summary:
Alchemia is a cryptic puzzle game which is solved through research outside of the game. 
 
This mysterious 17th century book on alchemy claimed to reveal the secret of the Philosopher's Stone to those who could solve the riddles and ciphers contained within.

name: All For Nought: Tic Tac Toe
summary: Classic Tic Tac Toe / Noughts & Crosses game with a minimalist style.

name: A Loddle to the Left
summary: A Little to the Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Alaska Gold Fever
summary: It’s 1896 and recently something unbelievable has been discovered in the cold and wild fields of Alaska. It was something special and precious, something so valuable that entire kingdoms fell over for its beauty… GOLD!

name: Alien Puzzle Adventure
summary: Alien Puzzle Adventure is a fast-paced, colourful and cartoony puzzle game, combining match-three gameplay with a humorous and quirky storyline.

name: Aliens vs. Pinball
summary:
Aliens vs. Pinball combines three exciting pinball tables into one terrifying game inspired by the ALIEN franchise!

Join Ellen Ripley as she confronts the Alien Queen and helps the Colonial Marines eliminate LV-426's alien infestation on the Aliens Pinball table.

Help Amanda Ripley survive the dangerous halls of Sevastopol Station while evading a merciless Xenomorph on the Alien: Isolation Pinball table.

Defeat Xenomorphs, rise in the ranks of Yautja society, and choose your allies wisely on the Alien vs. Predator Pinball table.

name: Altitude0: Lower & Faster
summary:
Altitude0: Lower & Faster is an extreme air racing game where crazy low and risky flying is the number one objective. 

Fly lower to be faster and take a chance on flying through moving obstacles to finish the race fastest. Create your own tracks and let your imagination fly.

name: Alloy Soldier Xenia
summary: Alloy Soldier Xenia is an open world action adventure platformer where you control a battle android in search of her memories and her purpose.

name: Alone on Mars
summary:
Alone on Mars is a 2D survival shooter on Mars.
An SOS signal was sent from Mars, which was captured by your spacecraft.
You decide to change your course and travel to the planet to figure out what happened.
Upon arrival, you notice that each space station is home to incomprehensible
creatures that appear to have attacked the expeditionary groups and they were
forced to send this signal. Did any of them survive? Are there any traces
their presence? What does the expeditionary program to visit Mars hide?

The gameplay is a platformer with a mixture of sandbox and Tower Defense.
Defend the generator, unlock new weapons and solve the riddle of Mars.

name: Alone in the Dark
summary: The iOS port of Alone in the Dark.

name: Albert and Puzzle Mansion
summary: Albert's cat has been abducted! Enter the mansion and solve puzzles in order to find and rescue the cat!

name: Algo Bot
summary:
Algo Bot is a coding-based puzzle game that takes place deep inside the Europa, a pan-galactic colonisation ship, where a recycling mission goes horribly wrong.

Use your algorithm special skills to command Algo Bot, a service droid, and help PAL, a cantankerous line manager, to contain the crisis.

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary: Alice in Wonderland is a game based on Lewis Carrol's classic story. The game is a side-scrolling adventure game in which the player controls Alice in her quest to return home from Wonderland. There's over 40 different characters to speak with including important characters from the book such as the Mad Hatter, the Cheshire Cat and the Queen of Spade. Not all the characters are all too willing to help you getting home.

name: Alone: Recode
summary: Step into the world of Alone - a new take on the classic turn-based fantasy RPG. Featuring challenging bosses and asymmetric world design Alone will defy your expectations of gameplay and exploration. Whether you are a RPG veteran or a new to the genre, you must experience Alone.

name: Alien
summary: 'Alien' is a cartoon style 2D platform jumping type game. Players need to control their characters to avoid the enemy and finally reach the end to win.

name: Alphabet Blocks
summary: Reading game for small children.

name: AlphaPit
summary: A word game from Shane McCafferty.

name: Alien Virus
summary: The player character, a pilot named Joshua Stone, lands on Station Zeus after a month in hyper space, but finds the space station empty of life.

name: Alien Gladiator
summary: Fight for your freedom in space arena!

name: Alien Blaster
summary: Shoot alien to gain boost!

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary: The DS version of the game is quite different from the Wii and PC. It is highly stylized, some characters have different abilities and it is a side-scroller. Absolem is also a playable character where in the other versions he is a NPC. Again the players must guide Alice though Wonderland to eventually face the Jabberwocky.

name: A Little Turtle Has Just Hatched on a Beach in Texas.
summary: Survive as a Kemp's Ridley sea turtle. Created for Bitsy Ocean Jam.

name: Alien Defense Unit
summary: Alien Defense Unit is a VR Tower Defense game where the player with his abilities and his friends are all that protects their tower.

name: Alien Boom Boom
summary: Join the fight against an alien invasion in this fast-paced, old-school FPS. Battle in your hometown, around the world, and even in space. Take on unique enemies and wield powerful weapons, all with a touch of classic fps sensibility. Can you save humanity from the brink of destruction? Boom boom.

name: All the King's Men
summary: A classic-styled, turn-based, 2D RPG with 60+ hours of open-world questing and exploration.

name: Alien Hominid: PDA Classic Pack 2
summary: Now even more levels from your favorite developers, The Behemoth. Grab three of your best friends and try out these amazing new levels. This pack contains 100 new PDA levels. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see . There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see .

name: A Lone Piece
summary: Easy to learn. Hard to master. A Lone Piece is a chess themed puzzle game where you control a single pawn caught in the middle of opposing hostile pieces. Your main job is to escape the board, but sometimes offence is the best defense. Become more than just A Lone Piece.

name: All Hallows Evie
summary: All Hallows Evie is a Halloween themed single screen style platform game moulded on the 8 bit classics of the ZX Spectrum.

name: Aleeious
summary: AleeiousMMO is a free open source browser MMO. It is a designed to mimic the new defunct Battlemail game. It is written in PHP and is licensed GPL v3, so anyone may learn from it as well as run their server. It is cross-platform and designed to run on as many devices as possible such as old legacy phones, smartphones and even the Amiga.

name: Alpha Decay
summary:
First-person shooter meets basebuilding!
Alpha Decay is a teambased Realtime Strategy Multiplayer Shooter, where your goal is to destroy the enemies base while you defend and build up your own.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Hardened Marine Pack
summary:
The Hardened Marine Pack includes the following cosmetic items for your Aliens: Fireteam Elite marine:
Bandana Head Accessory
Digital Red Camo Weapon Color
Adios Weapon Decal
Endeavor Weapon Decal
Flames Weapon Decal
"Chestburster" Joke Emote

name: Alpha Wings 2
summary: As one of the three brave pilots of Alpha Wing it's up to you to defeat the alien menace. Each Alpha Wing spacecraft has its own deadly weapons system to exterminate the vicious alien forces. These three courageous fighters are the last hope to bring freedom to the galaxy. Failure is not an option!

name: Alien Clones
summary: Be fast and accurate - defend yourself from the onslaught of alien clones.

name: A long Time
summary: Explore an abstract World of Clocks in this short First Person Platformer game. Can be completed in 10 Minutes.

name: Alien 3
summary: Port of "Alien³" for Commodore 64.

name: Alpha-1
summary: Alpha-1 is 2D side-scrolling slow-paced shoot'em up game in space, similar to R-Type. The player is pilot of Alpha-1 space craft, he fights against robotic-looking aliens' invasion - aliens invade Earth, and action takes place in space and aliens' lair.
