The player flies right forward and kill all enemies on screen. Alpha-1 has upgradeable energy cannon, ship can shoot down enemy missiles.

name: Alpha Terminus
summary: As a member of the Special Raiding Forces, you attack alien bases as a Ball turret gunner in virtual reality.

name: Alien Horizon
summary: A sci-fi city builder set on an inhospitable alien planet.

name: Alive 4-ever Returns
summary: Alive 4-Ever RETURNS is a shooter game developed and published by Hong Kong studio Meridian Digital Entertainment for iOS in 2010. It is the sequel to the 2009 game Alive 4-Ever.

name: All Star Action
summary: All Star Action is a game developed by Mere Mortals and was released for Sony PlayStation.

name: All in! Bundle
summary:
Get seven full games in one! Have a blast in your collection! Including:

- Awakening of Cthulhu
- Drift Racing Madness
- Color Motif Deluxe
- Alchemists's Castle
- Minefield
- Soccer Pinball
- World of Riders

name: All Star Racing 2
summary:
Mud Duck Productions' follow up title to 2002's All Star Racing changes focus from classic, stock and super cars to Truck, Kart, Grand Prix (open wheel) and Motorbike racing. Each type of vehicle in All Star Racing 2 features changeable color schemes and five tracks, and players can select from multiple viewpoints and three levels of difficulty. Five race lengths are offered (user's choice), beginning with three-lap sprints and increasing by increments of three, culminating in 15-lap endurance contests. 
 
All Star Racing 2 is Mud Duck Productions' follow up title to the 2002 title, All Star Racing. While the first game focuses on stock, classic and super cars, this title features open wheel, truck, sport bike, and kart racing.

name: Alaa: Mogus Must Die
summary: This is a historical action game from 3rd person based on Yakut mythology. Alaa-Mogus the devil has come to seize our land! Uraankhai Sakha, let's take up our weapons and drive him back to the dungeon! Uruy-Aikhal!

name: Alone
summary: An open world survival crafting game based more on realism. Craft, hunt, farm, build, and more to come.

name: Alone in the Grey
summary: Alone in the Grey is a first person adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: Alien Shooter World
summary:
The updated version of the legendary Alien Shooter is already available on all Android devices!

Now you can save the world from monsters together with your friends in co-op mode: invite friends to a squad or find new allies using auto-selection.

Thanks to the updated weapon system, you can choose equipment based on your playstyle. Combine different types of weapons or

name: Alien Odyssey
summary: You were just taking a regular old trip to an alien planet, when a big war happened to break out. Now, you're caught in the midst of a raging battle between the planet's native life form and a race called the Dak. The only chance you have of escaping safely is by helping the locals win the fight, so suit up, and come out with your guns blazing. This long-form adventure has no shortage of action to keep you on the edge of your seat, the puzzles are many, and the graphics are before their time.

name: All Star Kart Race: Crazy Gear Championship
summary: Put on your fire suit and get ready for the ride of your life! Extreme speeds, awesome thrills and spills await as you step onto the track. A brand new go kart awaits you! Can you take home the trophy?

name: Alien Cat
summary: Save the Universe with the Alien-Cat in this brand new puzzle-platformer game! Jump on your enemies heads, push the boxes and walk on the ceiling.

name: Alien 911
summary: A fast-paced combination of tower defense and high-octane 3rd player combat -- Alien 911 dares players to be the best they can be in defending allied civilizations from onslaughts of militant aliens all across the galaxy. Go solo or team up with some friends in local and online multiplayer.

name: Alleys
summary: The end of the Callisto campaign should have meant well-earnt retirement for you, marine.

name: Altarage
summary: Third-person hack and slash game where duels are won by striking at the enemy's vulnerable side.

name: AllYourArdu
summary: SHMUP game for the Arduboy meme jam with references to Zero Wing

name: Alpha Locus VR
summary: Alpha Locus VR is a horror wave based shooter for the HTC Vive (PC). You can fight through various waves using both melee weapons and guns. As an immersive shooter, this game is scary and fun.

name: Albatross: Tournament Golf
summary: Albatross is a top view golf game that consists of an 18 holes course. You can select your own clubs from 14 drivers, irons and a putter. Further you can adjust your stance, how you hit the ball and your swing. It features a split screen with two views, an overhead view of the entire hole and a more detailed zoom of your ball's current position. The screen also contains a status bar with all necessary information. The gameplay options include single player stroke play, multi player stroke play, or multi player match play.

name: Alien League
summary: Alien League is a 2 to 4 player local multiplayer party game. Play through 50+ fast-paced intense minigames, compete in the Board, earn Totems and fight to become the new Champion!

name: A Landlord's Dream
summary:
Abel Lowen, a Stringshaper, gets woke up by his apartment's alarm clock in the middle of the night. When he finally gets up, late for his band's rehearsal, he will find out that almost nothing seems to be working properly.

What's happening? Are others experiencing the same problems? Why is his neighbour hallucinating in the middle of the hallway?

name: Alan Saves Christmas
summary: A mild-mannered accountant called Alan tries to find out why Santa isn't delivering toys this year

name: Aliens Adventure
summary: Aliens Adventure is a super classic adventure game with legendary side-scrolling arcade platformer. Jump and shoot your way to freedom as you search for your fellow Aliens and break free from captivity. Enjoy this brand new super adventure platformer game!

name: All City King
summary: All City King is a stealth game where you take the role of an up-and-coming street artist. Your target is the subway trains and your goal is to make your art travel all over the city.

name: Alchemic Maze
summary:
Make the liquid flow through the maze by tilting your device. Explore the mysteries of alchemy!
Only a true master can uncover the secrets of the ancient art of alchemy! Take control of a flowing liquid, changing its properties and evading sophisticated traps. Become a great alchemist, create a magic crystal from various substances, and save an apprentice girl from the aftermath of an unlucky experiment. Dexterity and logical thinking will help you smash records and share your new accomplishments with your friends!

name: Alive 4-Ever
summary: With a naming scheme blatantly stolen from Left 4 Dead, Alive 4-Ever is a dual joystick shooter where the player controls a survivor of the zombie apocalypse.

name: Aliens Love Beefs
summary: Aliens are hungry and they would LOVE to have a bite of some tasty Beef. Abduct the Beefs on each planet avoiding ammo, explosions and lasers. Casual indie Virtual Reality game using cool spherical gravity game mechanics.

name: Alien Land
summary: This is a special simulation tower defense game, where you need to command each citizen to build a base. To produce food, one also needs to resist monsters from the night!

name: Alien Ambush
summary: Vertical space shooter

name: Alphabet Express Preschool
summary: An educational game aimed at preschoolers.

name: Alien Kingdom
summary: Alien Kingdom is a first person city building and strategy game that weaves medieval and sci-fi atmospheres. You'll go adventuring and find villagers you can escort home to help expand your kingdom, and construct utility buildings like farms, houses & resources buildings, defensive structures like gates, towers & walls, and unit...

name: Alexia Crow
summary: An adventure game with hand-painted graphics and an intriguing story. It's up to you to escape from the mysterious Cave Of Heroes by solving brain-bending puzzles. Explore a game world based on Ancient Greek mythology in this fascinating and thought-provoking journey.

name: Alpha Shark
summary: Ever wanted to be a great white shark? Now you can! Swim, eat, explore, and more! Lurk the margins of our world alone or with friends in this vast coral reef spanning the ocean floor.

name: Albert Mort: Desert Heat
summary: Albert Mort is a third-person/side-scroller action shooter game in which the main goal is to complete short but hard missions with different goals. Missions also contain sub missions and by completing them you can achieve medals for unlocking more missions (special commando action, for instance).

name: AlllCall
summary:
This is a mini shmups.
The boss appears when 8 large numbered enemies are defeated.
The stage is cleared when the boss is defeated.
On the way, press the X key when you have money (ALC).
You can buy weapons and restore HP.

name: Alia's Carnival! W-Package
summary: Alia's Carnival! W-Package is an Adventure game, developed and published by NanaWind, which was released in Japan in 2016.

name: Alipache in Wonderworld
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: All the Mods 9: No Frills
summary: ATM9 has over 400 mods and countless quests and a built in proper endgame. No Frills has way less mods but the same endgame.

name: Alien Invaders from the Planet Plorth
summary: Alien Invaders from the Planet Plorth is a shooter game in which the player moves sideways trying to dodge enemy bullets.

name: A Large Quantity of Mushrooms
summary:
ALQOM: A Large Quantity Of Mushrooms is an interactive experience for virtual reality, combining elements of adventure, exploration and horror genres.

You find yourself in a dark, surreal world full of mysteries and inhabited by strange creatures. Explore and interact with the environment to discover the nature of this strange new reality, learn the story of its inhabitants and get immersed in the world of horror and beauty, of reality and fantasy, despair and hope.

- exploration/horror game
- dark, surreal world
- interact with the environment, solve riddles, discover secrets
- slow-paced seated experience with classic first person view
- exclusively for Virtual Reality

name: All You Can Take
summary: Ever dreamed of becoming rich overnight, but don't fancy doing all that pesky hard work? You have one night to loot as much as you can from a house - just don't wake the owner! A 1-4 player physic-based stealth-robbery game.

name: Aldian of Ancients
summary: Aldian of Ancients is a dinosaur multiplayer simulation/survival game aims to recreate the world of yore filled with creatures that defy comprehension.

name: Alphabear
summary: Alphabear is a word puzzle game in which you spell words and collect cute bears whose powers boost your score.

name: Alchemy of Castle
summary: Alchemy of Castle is an interesting casual game. In the game, you will save the Devil from the seal by creating 30 panacea.

name: Alberi
summary: Puzzle game best described as a mix between sudoku and minesweeper.

name: Aliosso
summary: Combine tiles and run-changing cards to unleash power-packed combos and crush your enemies. Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn!

name: Alien Fish Finger
summary:
Alien Fish Finger is a shareware run and gun platformer where you play as Frank Finger on a mission to save the Earth from evil aliens. The gameplay includes fast paced gun battles, some destructible terrain, and secret areas. 
 
An updated version was released in 2011 as charity-ware.

name: All You Want Bundle
summary: A complete bundle for all players.

name: Alt Oxygen
summary: Alt Oxygen is a survival game based on an economical design. Beside to survive there is a story to understand what happened and where are you exactly in the universe.

name: Aldebaran Legend
summary: In a village located to the south, there is one of the twelve guardians, the warrior of Leo, known for his determination in combat and number of victories. Our hero will be responsible for finding the mystical artifacts, to prevent the kingdom from being bathed in blood and darkness.

name: Al Emmo's Postcards from Anozira
summary: The Mayor of Anozira wants to breathe some new life into his town and he needs you! Help Al Emmo and the locals bring tourists to Anozira! Explore the town and learn about the local stops and interesting areas as you use your Hidden Object skills to attract new people to the area and help local business survive.

name: Alien Attack: Pocket Edition
summary: You are a brave space trooper. Your mission is to clean an alien sector with a huge amount of enemies. Speaking shortly, you have to kill some aliens and return alive.

name: Always a New Journey
summary: A rogue-lite for 90's rpg fans

name: Alien Breeding Program: First Contact
summary: When an Alien ship appears above Earth, the world is thrown into chaos. Humanity, stunned to learn it is not alone in the universe, is quickly defeated by the technologically advanced Aliens. Among the chaos that follows, a woman named Natalie tries to find answers.

name: Alien Chaos 3D
summary: A lowly janitor must defend the planet from evil animal robots in this side-scrolling shooter from Swedish developer Ludosity Interactive. An enhanced follow-up to the developer's indie game for Xbox Live Arcade, Mama & Son: Clean House, the game has you guiding a bandana-clad hero while using his machine gun to blast an assortment of comical enemies, ranging from mechanical birds to armadillos. Your objective is to rescue your beloved mama, but you'll also have to clean up the mess you make while saving the world. Use the game's StreetPass feature to challenge friends.

name: AlienSurvival
summary: Survive as long as possible in an unknown world. Find energy packs and guns to stay alive and fight aliens.

name: Alien World Millionaire
summary: This is a chess game for strategic players. Players can buy real estate by rolling dice, play small games or go to the counting road to get tickets, buy cards and become their own winning secret. Use tactics to defeat other players, and finally become a millionaire in the different world.

name: A Lozenge
summary: “A Lozenge” is a short interactive story about a mother-daughter road trip and motion sickness, dedicated to children of divorce.

name: Alpine Alpaca
summary: Hit the slopes, turn by turn! Play cards, clear gates, and don't crash!

name: Alluna and Brie
summary: Alluna and Brie is an RPG Social Sim set in Axon City, Australia. Hang out with friends, buy food to boost your stats, and form a team of magical girls to fight off a horde of ravenous monster girls from a parallel dimension. It's just like real life!

name: Altar War
summary: Altar War is a virtual SLG + tower defense battle game with the alternate history as the background. It achieves the hegemony of the unity of the world by upgrading cities, building appropriate buildings, upgrading arms and training generals.

name: Alchemy
summary: Enter a world full of magic, mystery, beautiful landscapes and dangerous creatures. Gather materials, use elements as attacks, recombine them into building blocks... and use your Alchemist's power to give life to any shape you built.

name: Alon
summary: Dive into non-stop battles against endless waves of enemies. Use a variety of weapons and powers, customize your character, and discover new strategies.

name: A Little Space
summary: A casual, 2D space game about taking some time for yourself while paving humanity's way to a new world. Fly your way through a variety of bite-sized levels: dodge asteroids, power up satellites and even play football (soccer) in space!

name: Alphapoint
summary: Join the ultimate low-poly FPS experience on Steam with AlphaPoint. Engage in intense multiplayer battles, experiment with unique weapons and characters, customize your loadout, and compete against players from around the world. Download now on Steam.

name: Alert X: Ostatnia Nadzieja Ziemi
summary: Alert X is a classic side-scrolling space shooter, set in 2001 year, when an alien race invaded Earth. As a space fighter pilot the player must defeat waves of enemies, coming from each side of the board. The figure may be moved in each direction and have unlimited ammo. Each contact with an enemy unit or missile takes a large amount of energy, causing a quick destruction.

name: Alchemicraft
summary: Explore, Gather & Craft

name: A Lab of One's Own
summary: A virtual installation about womxn in science

name: Alex Kidd 3: Curse in Miracle World
summary: Alex Kidd 3: Curse in Miracle World is a hack of Alex Kidd in Miracle World (1986) for the Sega Master System created by Yéti Bomar that modifies the Sega game to turn it into a sequel with new levels.

name: All Good Things
summary: Compilation cart with clones of Asteroids, Space Invaders Part II, Tetris and Kaboom!, along with a hidden bonus game.

name: Alone in the Forest VR
summary: Explore the forest, solve the puzzles, start the generators and call for help. Use the flashlight to defend yourself from the 'thing' that tries to kill you.

name: Alcatraz: A Fuga Impossível
summary: Alcatraz: A Fuga Impossível is a text-based adventure where you need to escape from the famous prison Alcatraz.

name: Aladdin: Save the Princess
summary: Come and save the princess in this game with exciting new levels! Simple to control!! You can play with one hand very fast. Luckily Princess's friend has found you for this job. Good Luck! Let God be with you!

name: Always Green
summary: Burn your thumbs with Always Green a fast paced tapping game!

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary: Alice in Wonderland is an adventure platformer based upon the two Alice books by Lewis Carrol and created using the same engine as Below the Root. However, whereas that game had more of a focus on role playing, Alice has more of a focus on puzzle solving.

name: Aldo's Adventure
summary: A jumping arcade game. You control Aldo character and your goal is to leave every level while avoiding obstacles and enemies.

name: Alian
summary: This is a normal shooting game. There is nothing extra in it.

name: All You Can Eat
summary:
After ten years of living in a diner with a single "All You Can Eat" coupon, your existence is threatened by the diner's imminent foreclosure! Embark on an epic... um... mundane journey to protect your way of life!

All you can eat is a point and click adventure stylized like a daily comic.

name: Alien Duel Elements
summary: Challenge your friends on a one-on-one simple, easy-to-handle 2D platform. Play as Aliens mastering elementary powers such as Fire, Frost and Arcanes. Customize your character as well as the Game modes.

name: Aletheia: Return of Odysseus
summary: Embark on an accurate retelling of Homer’s Odyssey. A classic-inspired CRPG that puts you in control of Odysseus during his return home from the Trojan War. The game features turn-based combat, detailed character creation, choices and consequences, and a faithful depiction of Homer's Greece.

name: Alum
summary: Guide Alum on his journey through the "Land of Tide". Help him discover the truth about his city, Kosmos, and the mysterious epidemic known as "The Vague". As the tale unfolds, it will keep you enthralled all the way up to its epic conclusion. Alum is an original point-and-click adventure game.

name: Alpacalypse
summary: Alpacalypse is a 2.5D action platformer where you control Pancake The Llama, fighting to rescue your wife, The Mrs. Kick and spit your way through hordes of alpacas, collecting coins, and platforming your way to victory.

name: Alganon
summary: Old school fantasy MMORPG in which gamers play together in a large world featuring a rich history dominated by commanding deities, powerful weapons & armor, deadly magic, epic quests, ancient places to discover, cities & lands to conquer, the utilization of detailed trade skills, and more.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Sharp Sticks
summary: Available for use in Aliens: Colonial Marines, and as referenced by Hudson in Aliens, the prototype sonic-harpoon artillery remote projectile (S.H.A.R.P.) rifle fires time-delayed, explosive-tipped darts that embed themselves into enemies or terrain.

name: Alien Caseno
summary: Some aliens decided to make their own version of an Earthling casino.

name: AlphaMan
summary: Alphaman is an action platformer made with nostalgic love from similar platformers of the past and present. Jump, shoot, and dash your way through various stages, gaining new powers and abilities along the way to stop the Red Bombers!

name: A Lazy Magic Teacher
summary: In this visual novel you play as Mike, a fat and failing wizard, in his quest to uncensor a photo of a naked woman.

name: Alabama Smith in Escape from Pompeii
summary:
An adventure/hidden object game.

Join Alabama Smith as he quests for the time-bending Amulet of Ages in this action-packed Adventure game! Solve elaborate puzzles to uncover the location of a lost, mystical relic that allows its bearer to travel through time. Then, step into the role of fateful Anastasia as she races to save Alabama Smith from a cataclysmic disaster! Loads of challenging puzzles and magical mini-games await you in Alabama Smith: Escape from Pompeii!

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 1
summary: Map Pack 1 for Alien Arena, includes 4 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 4
summary: Map Pack 4 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: All New World of Lemmings
summary:
They're back! Lead three Lemming Tribes (Egyptian, Classic and Shadow) as they attempt to tame new homelands.

Featuring 90 levels of enhanced Lemming gameplay, larger Lemmings in crazy costumes, new objectives and, for the first time, bad guys to be confronted!

name: A Long Stroll
summary: The game that an old woman walks in a long straight road.

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary: Discover unique and original characters in the amazing world of Wonderland.

name: All of You
summary: ALL OF YOU is a cute, purely visual, accessible, family-friendly puzzle adventure game with unique gameplay. Play and pause each section of a level to unveil the correct path for the main character. Follow the journey of a clumsy chicken that will travel through all kinds of places in search of her lost chicks. Created by Alike Studio (Love You to Bits, Bring You Home).

name: Align 12
summary:
Move-Align Puzzle!
Creative Puzzle!
Different Puzzle!

name: A Loving Family
summary: Join the emotional journey of "A Loving Family" as a college student returns home after his father's passing. Amidst grief, watch him and his new step-family learn to embrace differences and forge unbreakable bonds of love.

name: Alibi
summary: A 60-Second Detective Story.

name: Alpha Centauri
summary: Doom2 episode using doom1 stock textures plus alpha textures. I put more emphasis in lighting this time.

name: A Letter to Luna
summary: A short rhythm game created for a mini game jam. Use the power of music to send your letter! Score well enough and you might even get something back.

name: Alight in the Dark
summary: Alight in the Dark is a reverse bullet hell survival game where players use abilities and equipment to survive. Unlock characters and upgrade base stats as you play, in a world where humanity has split light into five main elements, with a mysterious sixth. Make strategic decisions to survive.

name: Ales Dash
summary:
Ales Dash is a Side-Scrolling 3D Action Game.
You control Ales running forward and Clear the Level while over obstacles.

name: All Star Soccer
summary: A Football game developed and published by Eidos Interactive, released for the PlayStation in 1997.

name: Altered Fates
summary: Obscure JRPG made with RPG Maker VX with many routes.

name: Al Andalus 711
summary: Al Andalus 711 is a first-person graphic adventure game set in a historical version of medieval Spain from the 8th century. The player takes on the role of a young fisherman who will travel to a series of locations to carry out different missions.

name: Alliance Space Guard
summary: A sci-fi space simulation game with a focus on spaceship systems and orbital mechanics

name: Aliens versus Humans: Missions
summary:
Aliens versus Humans: Missions introduces multiplayer PvP with three PvP modes. Challenge your friends or random people via Game Center. If you were awesome at the original X-Com, this is your chance to own the leader boards. What are you waiting for?
In addition, you can play the single player mode where you play through 25 missions that follow a storyline about why the aliens are back on Earth, how they got here and it is up to you to figure out how to remove the alien threat.

name: Alchemical Inc.
summary: Card battle your rivals turn by turn. Explore the mean steampunk streets of New Folk City. Trade your cards to craft the perfect deck or else you're going home empty handed.

name: Alchemist Arena
summary: Battle through a series of arenas as the alchemist; a potion hurling fighter who seeks to overcome his foes. Fight a horde of varied and deadly enemies to increase your high score, unlock items, grow your stats and become master of the alchemist arena.

name: Alien Cat 6
summary: If you want to feel like an attentive owner of a restless cat, then this game will be to your taste!

name: Aliens X
summary: Oldschool 2Д-shooter of the Windows 2000 epoch, controlled by mouse. 2-player local cooperative mode with several difficulty levels.

name: All Kamen Rider: Rider Generation 2
summary: All Kamen Rider: Rider Generation 2 is the sequel to the 2D Beat 'Em Up sidescoller video game, All Kamen Rider: Rider Generation, published by Bandai Namco. It was released on August 2, 2012 for the Nintendo DS and the Sony PSP.

name: Alternate Worlds
summary: Alternate Worlds is an RPG sandbox experience.

name: Altered Anomalies
summary: You are trapped in a nightmare on Mumbai's late-night local train. Shift between horrifying alternate dimensions as reality bends around you. Use your phone to scan, analyze, and solve puzzles in the warped world. Race against time to find your way home before the altered anomalies consume you.

name: Altered
summary: Altered is a trading card game from French publisher Equinox. It has a focus on exploration instead of combat, and 1:1 digital ownership, which can be used to play the game in its entirety (via official license/partnership) on Board Game Arena.

name: A Light Jog
summary: A Light Jog is a 2D endless runner game with 4 different places to travel through as you, the player, jog as long as you can while passing hazards that could stop you.

name: Alea
summary: Basically, you are in control of an Eight-ball that gets thrown on different platforms and needs to achieve a certain goal. Now, the platforms are consisted of smaller dice blocks, each dice block has a certain value of numbers on it and a certain color.

name: Alien Cat 3
summary: Having found his home on one of the distant planets, the space cat decides to settle down on it. But the local creatures did not appreciate this choice and decide to drive away the furry alien. Our task is very simple, to protect yourself and your shelter from the attacks of unfriendly monsters.

name: A Little Piece of Healing
summary: A mini-case by risefromtheashes. Inspired in part by Apples and Oranges and Gloria in Somnium.

name: Alurwe: Ein Spaziergang durch Alt-Urfahr West
summary: Old Urfahr West (Alurwe) is a very old district of Linz / Danube. Alturfahr has its own character. From old to old, not very old or modern, houses and squares, streets and alleys, shops and restaurants are all present. The people are friendly, children can still play on the street, everywhere dogs and cats are encountered. (Strangely many cats?) Feel the peculiar flair of Urfahr by playing ALURWE.

name: Alley Cat: Remeow Edition
summary: A remake of the 1983 game Alley Cat (Atari 8-bit/IBM PC) with more modern graphics and sound and some added features, most notably several new stages and a multiplayer mode.

name: All in! Bundle
summary: The All in! Bundle is like a box of chocolates—full of bugs, tools, planes… Um, wait a minute—we mean full of adventure and fun! Renovate together in Tools Up!, conquer the skies in Red Wings: Aces of the Sky, and visit the surreal world of insects in Metamorphosis.

name: All Valentine Pairs Memory Game
summary: The objective is to find all the matching pairs. Playing is very simple, you turn over one card and then turn over another one to find its matching pair.

name: Alliance: Future Combat
summary: A RTS for PC that is set in the far flung future of 2008

name: Alison Fall of the Apple
summary: In Alison Fall of the Apple, you play a highly trained military veteran Michael (default name) who has been working as a cop in NYC.

name: Alpha Command
summary: Arcade style retro game in virtual reality.

name: AlpenCross
summary: AlpenCross is an nature Simulation Game for PC.

name: Alette If
summary:
In Alette If, player controls Penny, a Metal Knight pilot who travels to a mysterious archaeological site to find her partner.

Submitted in this 2019's #GMTKJam. The theme of the jam was "Only One", so the game features: one action button, one character, one place, one enemy, one NPC and one battle. In Alette If, player controls Penny a pilot who set off on a journey to find Des her partner in the archaeological site El Zotz.

name: Alter Ego S
summary: Enhanced version of Alter Ego.

name: Alan Hansen's Sports Challenge
summary: Alan Hansen's Sports Challenge is a trivia game created by Oxygen Interactive.

name: Alone In a Dream
summary: The Dream Witch lives in a Dreamworld with her only friend, Mr. Prestone.One day, darkness comes into the Dreamworld, and they kidnap Mr. Prestone.She goes through the darkness of the world alone to get Mr. Prestone back.

name: Alien on the Run
summary: An escape game where you must slide, roll, punch and pose your way to the finish. Avoid tractor beams as Delude, the alien abducted by other aliens.

name: All Day Dying: Redux Edition
summary: A single player score attack game for quick sessions of focused adrenaline where you complete various goals and beat difficult score challenges. Only pure combat where precision and technique is rewarded

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 5
summary: Map Pack 5 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: A Long Way Through a Pastel Universe
All Stars Racing Jumper
summary:
Let's go Time to run
Race anytime, anywhere!

name: Alabama Smith: Escape from Pompeii
summary: Join a young archaeologist for an amazing adventure in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii. Help Alabama search for hidden clues, solve perplexing puzzles, and discover the truth about the Amulet of the Ages. Will Alabama solve the mystery before it's too late? Will Anastasia be able to save him from the eruption of Mount Vesuvius? Find out in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii Deluxe!

name: Allumette
summary: Allumette tells a story about love, sacrifice and a deep bond between a young girl and her mother.

name: Alien Insanity
summary: Aliens have invaded Earth and these thing are weird. Mechanical steam-powered shells... bipedal robots... flying eyeballs drones... Can this all be real? The aim of each level is simple: Kill all the aliens - then find the exit. 24 mind-bending levels! Create and share mods with the inbuilt level editor.

name: Alawar Hidden Realms Bundle
summary: Get Alawar Hidden Realms Bundle, Adventure game for PS3™ console from the official PlayStation® website. Know more about Alawar Hidden Realms Bundle Game.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines - Sawed-off Double Barrel Shotgun
summary: Use this shotgun in Aliens: Colonial Marines to take down enemies with a blast from the past.

name: Alien Protection
summary: In this exciting game, you become a brave space traveler who finds himself on an alien planet after your spaceship breaks down.

name: Alone in the Dark
summary: The first attempt at remaking the 1992 game with the same name done by Eden Games, which got cancelled in response to the negative response to the sequel of that game.

name: Alice's Burger Shop
summary: It is a simulation game that manages a burger shop. Take orders and serve food without making customers wait. Research the cuisine and devise decorations to enhance the appeal of the restaurant. Pay attention to the feelings of the staff, manage the shop efficiently, and aim for a famous shop.

name: Along Came Treble
summary: Along Came Treble is the first and thus far only book of the Along Came Treble series.

name: All of Us: His Story
summary:
All of Us is the umbrella title for a pair of complementary books in the All of Us series.

Uniquely, the two books in the All of Us series released simultaneously with parallel and overlapping storylines. These are All of Us: Her Story, which features a female main character with a female love interest, and All of Us: His Story, which features a male main character with a male love interest.

name: Alice In VR
summary:
Fall down the rabbit hole as Alice in Wonderland!
Drink from the bottle and become tiny, eat the cake and become huge. Meet the cat, the rabbit and the caterpillar - all in VR!

name: All the Way Down
summary: A Lovecraftian adventure set in rural Yorkshire, England.

name: Alfelus
summary: Alfelus is an arcade action game where the blue warrior Alfelus must fight against the infinite army of the enemy Red Kingdom. Alfelus must use a combination of his sword, his wits, and randomly appearing magical artifacts in order to survive as long as he can and try to obtain a high score.

name: Alien X
summary: Alien X - is a hardcore game where you will have to survive playing like a monster Bomber who is on an unknown planet.

name: Allon3
summary: A phychological horror experience of voices and screams.

name: Alphabear: Hardcover Edition
summary: Alphabear is an award-winning, original English word puzzle game by Spry Fox. Spell words, collect bears!

name: All In Everyday
summary: Winning gets you a model, losing means no life. Reincarnation follows, give it another shot! Don't talk to me about game theory, probability, or value regression, I'm all in! With a leverage that reaches the sky, I'm all in!

name: A Long Way Home
summary: A short handcrafted roguelike survival.

name: Alphabeats: Master Edition
summary:
Alphabeats remixes spelling into a fast-paced action challenge, set to pulse-pounding tracks from exciting electronic artists. It's words and music, mashed up.

Play custom songs from your hard drive, or thrill to included tracks by Disasterpeace, Big Giant Circles, and more.

name: Alien Drug Lords: The Chyropian Connection
Alien Strike
summary: Alien Strike makes use of digitized images, music, and speech, which is noteworthy for a 1987 release. The in-game screen is separated by a line into two sides. Each player controls a jet. You have to shoot the carriers and ships on your enemy's side of the screen while preventing the other player from destroying yours. The game speed is insanely high. You probably won't stand any chance against the computer, but with two players, this could be fun for a short while.

name: Alchemia
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Alien Survivors: To Starship Resurrection
summary:
Defeat the aliens and repair your spaceship to survive!
Each stage equipped with a hot skill!
A roguelike shooter that blows everything away!

name: Alone in the School
summary: A girl who has lost her memory must collect five scattered memory fragments in the school to remember the events of that day.

name: Alkey the Brave
summary: Alkey the Brave is an action adventure game with a focus on dynamic battles. Go through an exciting adventure in ancient time, fight hordes of thugs, struggle with cruel tyrants, gather brave warriors under your banner and defeat cryptic invaders.

name: All Roads
summary: Venice. The tight winding alleys and long dirty canals. Easy to become lost here, where every street emerges somewhere unexpected. In the central square a scaffold has been erected for your neck, and if only you can escape for long enough you might survive, but in this city all roads lead back to Piazza San Marco and the Hanging Clock.

name: Alchemia Story
summary: Create the character you really want, and explore the alchemy world with the help of "YOME"!

name: Alchemist code
summary: A game where two brothers find the path in making peace overcoming all obstacles.

name: Alienated 2
summary: Alienated 2 is a unique survival top-down shooter with RPG elements. Battle countless waves of infected and complete multiple diverse mission objectives. Hunt elite monsters for rare guns and loot. Face monstrous zombie bosses and receive epic and unique loot drops. Complete item sets, upgrade equipment and distribute stats to create countless builds. In this top down shooter, you will face never-ending hordes of walking dead and the only option for survival is to kill them all.

name: Alcahest
summary: Alcahest is an action role-playing game with a top-down perspective that plays similar to The Legend of Zelda. It is divided into 8 stages that are progressed by finding items that aid the protagonist Alen on his quest, and end with a boss battle. After specific boss fights, the player will gain the abilities of one of the four elemental Guardians. Alen will also find five allies that will join him at predetermined points of some levels. They are the young wizard Garstein, the princess Elikshil, the knight Sirius, the android Magna and the shape-shifter dragon goddess Nevis. Though they cannot be controlled directly, allies will attack and use special moves when the corresponding button is pressed.

name: AliveZ
summary: Fifteen years ago, a mysterious shrine suddenly appeared. It emitted an evil air and people were transformed one after another.... Yin, a group of evil people, and Yang, a group of people who has an opposite nature to Yin. The story takes place in the midst of slaughter happened in the town....

name: Alien Cat 5
summary: Alien Cat 5 is a game that will capture your attention for a long time and will make you feel like a full-fledged pilot of a huge spaceship.

name: All Dream Long A Flower Storm
summary: Award-winning point-and-click game FREE to download and play! Relax into a dreamscape full of fairytales, legends, and peculiar scenery. With the help of friendly demon Baku, solve riddles and puzzles to reach the true end and wake up... if you want to wake up, that is.

name: Alphabetic
summary: You better know your Alphabet and react fast for this colorful puzzler.

name: Alright x4
summary: Wanna know how I'm doing? Alright.

name: Alpha Pairs
summary: Dr. Atoz is your host in this fun test of memory matching and spelling. Watch out for Alphy who is always hungry for letters.

name: Altered Algorithm
summary: Altered Algorithm is an action-thriller VR experience blending the craft of film and games in a new way. In this story-driven game set in a futuristic 1983 LA, your playground will be detective work, head-to-head combat, and the ability to DYNAMICALLY interact with full motion video characters.

name: All Star Racing
summary:
All Star Racing combines four distinct racing modes: GT Racer, Stockcar Frenzy, Classic Cars, and Supercar Challenge. Pre-race options include difficulty setting (easy, medium or hard), number of laps (3-lap sprints to 15-lap endurance races), Dualshock vibration, and sound volume adjustments. This budget title from Mud Duck Productions offers single races against five computer-controlled opponents and a choice of three cars per racing style. No multiplayer or career modes are available. 
 
Each race style includes three courses and three types of vehicles. The classic cars (Stalwort, Belling V2, and SK MK2) race on or through mountains, hillsides, and forests. GT cars (GSX, GT2R and CRX2) run at Iona, Boulder, and Hampton speedways, while Champ Team, File Team, and SPD Team stockcars race on runway, countryside, and urban tracks. The super cars (Pina 238, Fenzo 500, and Manelli 748) compete on hills, ridges, and a forest-valley track. 
 
All Star Racing includes GT, stockcar, super cars, and classics racing on a limited number of fictional tracks. Though released in 2002, All Star Racing's graphics and gameplay are reminiscent of early to mid-90s racing titles.

name: Aleste 2
summary: The game takes place in the year 2039, two decades after the super computer DIA51 attacked and decimated the Earth. After the long restoration period, Earth is invaded by a race of alien plant-like humanoids called the Vagand, intent on finding a new food source on Earth. In their first attack on Earth, the Vagand destroys an Earth space cruiser commanded by the previous Earth hero, Ray Waizen. Their plan to invade Earth is challenged by the newest version of the Aleste piloted by the daughter of Ray and Yuri Waizen, Ellinor, who has vowed to avenge her father's death and to personally kill the Vagand leader Gaizel.

name: ALF the Alien Life Form
summary: ALF has an enormous appetite (eating everything he can get his hands on); he is also troublesome, sarcastic, slovenly and cynical, and sometimes he puts himself at the risk of being discovered while perpetrating some of his often-unintentional pranks. However, if things have gone too far, he does as much as possible to make up for his mistakes, generally with positive results.

name: Alteil
summary: Alteil is the most popular online card game in Japan according to Dex Entertainment. It was released in 2004 in Japan, then in 2008 in North America.

name: Alone in the Mars
summary: Alone In The Mars is a 2D side-scrolling shooter. Your main character is a cannon operator at a guarded facility. Your goal is to defend the mines from malicious insect-like geeks for a year. Order upgrades from the main base and protect civilization from an alien threat in all possible ways!

name: Alone in Pico
summary: A small demake of the classic Alone in the Dark in PICO-8 with 3D meshes of the characters ripped from the original game. Choose between Emily Hartwood and Edward Carnby and find your way out of the top two floors of the mansion.

name: Allergy Assassin
summary: Exploit your enemy's weakness

name: Alienstein
summary: Alienstein is a retro inspired FPS with random generated levels and boss fights

name: Alone in the War
summary: In this isometric shooter, you are the only agent left to destroy an entire army of soldiers. Get your weapons and get ready to shoot anyone in your way.

name: Alice Greenfingers 2
summary: Sequel to Alice Greenfingers.

name: Alchemist of War
summary: Alchemist of War is a casual card game with crafting elements. Play as the alchemist merchant. Craft weapons using random ingredients. Your customers are from both sides of a war. But you don't have any favorites! As long as they keep paying. And if the fight goes on longer, maybe you can sell more.

name: Alice: An Interactive Museum
summary: Japanese-developed visual novel / point-and-click adventure game, released in 1991. The title and imagery is inspired by Alice in Wonderland. Designed and directed by Haruhiko Shono, it pioneered the use of pre-rendered 3D graphics in adventure games, two years before Myst.

name: Alteration
summary: Master the elements and your mind.

name: Algernon
summary: Chase a mouse through a strange infinite maze.

name: Alundra 2: A New Legend Begins
summary: You are Flint, a renegade swordsman on a quest to free a kingdom from the grip of a sinister ruler. Through a land of hidden danger you wield your weapon, navigating an intricate story wrought with bizarre characters, brain-twisting puzzles and wild games. Beware! An even greater evil is about to be revealed...

name: Alex Rider: Stormbreaker
summary: Based on Anthony Horowitz's series of teen spy movies and movie following adventure-seeker Alex Rider. Players embrace the role of Alex Rider to out-spy, outwit and out-cool evil in this thrilling action adventure. Featuring third-person stealth game play, fast-paced racing action, intense fighting and engaging, gadget-based mini-games, players can relive defining moments from the Stormbreaker movie and become the ultimate spy.

name: Alexei Run
summary: AlexeiRun - Runner, where you have to go around many obstacles, running away from HIM. Collect discs and buy upgrades to go all the way, unlocking new levels and difficulties. After this game, your reaction and manual dexterity will increase dramatically.

name: Algodoo
summary: Algodoo is a physics-based 2D sandbox freeware from Algoryx Simulation AB as the successor to the popular physics application Phun. It was released on September 1, 2009 and is presented as: a learning tool, an open ended computer game, an animation tool, and an engineering tool.

name: All-Star Baseball 2000
summary:
The Game Boy Color port of All-Star Baseball 2000

All-Star Baseball 2000 is the second release in the series and includes a range of improvements and new features compared to the '99 version. Motion captured technology allows a realistic representation of player movements, swings, throws and catches. Apart from the improved roster management, which includes the ability to sign players from the minor league and create new players with new stats, you are able to play a 162 game inter-league season or complete the 1999 MLB scheduled season.
Once more there are 30 teams available in the game, as well as home stadiums and home or away jerseys. Additionally players' face sizes and play styles coincide with the real ones, since the game is licensed.

name: Alice Dreams Tournament
summary: Alice Dreams Tournament is a competitive party action game for Dreamcast.

name: A Long Way to the Nearest Star
summary:
A thief on the run from the galactic police finds refuge on an abandoned spaceship. A lonely ship AI finds unexpected company.

Explore the ship, solve puzzles, uncover mysteries, and befriend an AI who probably isn't trying to kill you.

name: Albert
summary:
Follow Albert through a whole day, from awakening to his trip in an air balloon, from the fun fair to a charming date with lovely Lili!
Help Albert with 20 beautifully and artistically designed adventures. Each steps gives you stars, starts give you access to the next steps. Easy and simple. Yet Albert will need all your dexterity and wit to help him complete 20 smart and fun levels.

name: All Knowledge Authority
summary: Be part of the All Knowledge Authority, and go in search of those forgotten mysteries in the corners of the world. Discover the secrets that forces that will surprise you want to hide. Go out in search of your destiny, that which unites the present, the past and the future.

name: Algomancy
summary: A competitive card game where you draft during gameplay to adapt to your opponent's strategy. Absolutely free to play with no grinding.

name: Alcatraz
summary: I was surprised to end up in Alcatraz. Having the best lawyer, I had hoped to be acquitted. But all his efforts to get me acquitted were in vain. My sentence screamed: "Welcome to hell, son." And so I found myself among thieves, murderers and rapists.

name: A Letter From Mom
summary: On the morning of your 14th birthday, you receive a party invitation from your missing mom. The address leads you to a cult village. In this point-and-click puzzle adventure, you play as Nero, a black cat, as you unravel the mysteries behind your mom's disappearance.

name: Alien Gate
summary: A terrifying evil is threatening the safety of your planet. Hordes of monsters are advancing through the Alien Gate with one objective in mind - the destruction of your world! Only you can ward off this danger. As a rocket fighter pilot, your coolheadedness will be tested to the utmost. The last battle has begun.

name: Allied Nations
summary: Allied Nations is an primarily online RPG/RTS akin to games such as Dwarf Fortress and the more modern RimWorld. You are able to easily manage units, wage war, build and roleplay. Through your own wit, might, or sheer luck can you survive this experience? Probably not but give it your best try!

name: Al-Ankabut
summary: Al Ankabut involves the hunt for the frailest of webs, the spider’s web. Throughout this journey, the player is tried with mathematical challenges and taught wisdom from the holy book.

name: A.L.I.G.N.E.D
summary: Line up matching pieces in rows or columns to delete to delete them and clear the board.

name: Alfred Chicken
summary: Alfred Chicken is a platform video game developed by Twilight and published by Mindscape. The game was released for Amiga, Amiga CD32, Game Boy, NES, Super NES in 1993 and February 1994, in Europe and North America, respectively.

name: Aladdin: Fate of Agrabah
summary: Disney almost released a PC game based on the disneyvision Aladdin's Magic Carpet Ride. In the ride, the Genie is trapped in the Cave of Wonders, and the player must find gems in Agrabah to rescue him. The game would have featured 2D animation created by Disney TV Animation, but it was ultimately canceled.

name: Almighty: God Idle Clicker
summary:
Did you ever imagine, how is it to create your own idle world by ruling the whole universe? Then play the god and become idle world tycoon by evolving your world through the ages, in the most immersive clicker game ever!

You start to rule your own idle world after big bang which has created first living forms on your world, but that's just the beginning! Heaven wants more, so discover legendary species to gain more boost, optimize your income, complete the quests, upgrade your statistics, click to gain energy and of course claim rewards!

name: Alboite
summary:
Twitch game to play with your chat.
The streamer makes up a phrase and puts the words in a "box" without revealing them to viewers. Then viewers simply write words in the chat to gradually reveal the sentence and thus score points based on the number of words and the number of characters found. Score a max of points to win a game and climb the monthly ladder.

name: All Star Cheer Squad 2
summary: Players will start out as the captain of the Tiger Squad, leading the team to victory by utilizing an all-new diverse move set that includes real-world aerial stunts, tumbling, formation changes and advanced moves on the Wii Balance Board. Moves can be executed by using two Wii Remotes (similar to We Cheer).

name: Alien Food Frenzy
summary: Protect yourself and the world against fierce food animated by aliens to enslave human kind. Built exclusively for room-scale VR with the HTC Vive.

name: Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo
summary: Alchemia is a turn-based strategy roguelike with a hint of puzzle. You'll collect alchemical reagents, building your own personalized combat satchel, and combine them into magical recipes, unique to each run, to battle against outlandish foes.

name: Alien Attack: Zero
summary: You are a brave stormtrooper, Alien Forces Annihilators Squad member. Your mission is to destroy every single enemy inside of your sector. At least, to try.

name: All Mighty Tower
summary: Build the highest tower in the world. Place the block the right time to not to lose any length of the block.

name: Alex's Journey to the Grave
summary: Alex's Journey to the Grave is a visual novel about a boy trapped by fate and a girl in dire need of a friend. Help guide them through some of the hardest decisions of their lives as they experience warmth, connection, tragedy, the inevitability of death... and the antics of a mysterious black cat.

name: Aliens Are Rude!
summary: The robots were dancing happily away until the aliens came and crashed the party! Engage in space combat, traverse planets, learn abilities from aliens, upgrade with perks and titles, strategize, dodge, shoot, and reclaim the nebulous!

name: Alfredo
summary: You play as Alfredo and you need to catch some of the things coming out of the big jar, and some of them are enemies and if they touch you, you die.

name: Alpha Zoo
summary: A cozy typing game for parents to play with their young children. Build a zoo, ride the rides, eat and shop, explore and play together!

name: All World Pro Wrestling: Bonus Stories
summary: Three super-hot new wrestling stories!

name: Aladdin Magic Carpet Racing
summary:
"Aladdin Magic Carpet Racing" is an exhilarating, fast-paced racing game set against the enchanting backdrop of Agrabah. Players can choose to race as either Aladdin or Princess Jasmine, navigating their way through four uniquely designed and challenging race courses. The game’s vibrant visuals and dynamic tracks capture the essence of the magical world, offering an immersive racing experience.

In each race, players will dodge obstacles, collect power-ups, and outmaneuver opponents to gain the lead. The courses are filled with iconic locations from the Aladdin universe, providing a nostalgic yet thrilling adventure. The ultimate goal is to defeat the evil sorcerer Jafar in the final showdown to win the prestigious Agrabah Cup and become the reigning magic carpet racing champion.

name: Alice in the maze
summary: Help alice find the door in the maze.

name: Alien Hunt
summary: Alien hunt - Take on the role of an alien who loves to hunt for jewels in this extraordinary platformer! Climb deeper into the caves and collect all the gems, but beware of vampires who will be very unhappy that someone disturbed their peace.

name: ¡Alla tú!: juego interactivo de DVD
summary: ¡Alla tú!: juego interactivo de DVD is an interactive DVD game based on the Spanish version of Deal or No Deal, featuring the host Jesús Vázquez.

name: Alea Jacta Est: Hannibal Terror of Rome
summary: Hannibal: Terror of Rome covers the epic wars waged from 230 to 201 BC by the two superpowers of the Ancient World: Carthage and Rome. You will be able to relive the Second Punic War and the face-off between Hannibal with his elephants and the Roman general Scipio Africanus.

name: Aloners
summary:
One day, the last man on Earth came home to find a girl sleeping on his bed.

This is a free to play Visual-Novel by Sonnet009

name: Alex the Ball
summary: Alex has turned into a ball after an experiment went wrong. As he navigates Nova Station, things become even more complicated when he finds himself in a parallel universe. A physics-based 3D platformer that can be completed in one go, if you don't fall, die, or quit.

name: Alternative World Games
summary: Alternative World Games is a sports themed game for the ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64.

name: Alkemo: Kemomimi Alchemist
summary: A role-playing game from souzai-soft.

name: Alcyone
summary: Alcyone is a Science Fiction 3D First Person Shooter (FPS) Video Game set in an Open World mid-crisis New York City (NYC) that can be freely explored by the players.

name: Alcyone: The Last City
summary: Alcyone: The Last City is an interactive sci-fi novel where your choices can lead to the salvation or destruction of the last refuge of civilisation in the universe. Immerse yourself in a branching narrative of diverse characters, intrigue, and world-altering decisions.

name: All You Can Feed: Sushi Bar
summary:
All You Can Feed: Sushi Bar let's you handle your own Sushi place. Create Maki, Nigiri or Futomaki, served with Green Tea, Soy Sauce and Wasabi to satisfy to your customers. 
Can you handle your own Sushi Bar or will you drown in orders?

name: Alto Trek
summary: Multiplayer game, developed for Xerox Alto, where each player uses their own Alto workstation to control a starship. The objective of the game is to destroy the enemy without being destroyed. A player can choose between of being a Klingon, Romulan, or Terran. The game can be played by one player, but there will be no enemy to destroy.

name: Alpha Omega
summary: Can you solve each crossword puzzle, with only the first and last letters as your guide?

name: Aliya
summary: You accidentally connect with a girl in space who is in distress 1000 years later... How will you solve the crisis and discover the truth?

name: Alien
summary: A sci-fi themed action/strategy game.

name: A.L.A.N.
summary: A short Visual Novel, with light RPG elements, made in RPG MAKER MV.

name: Alien Spidy: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
summary:
Now unlock 3 more ridiculously difficult “Special” levels, which are set to test your ability and skill to the very extreme!

Once again you are set a challenge that has you travelling through the Forest, but this time there is no mercy! The smallest mistakes will send you right back to the start of this most brutal and unforgiving level. If you really think that you have what it takes to get Spidy from A to B then be our guest…

Determination is what you will need when you are dropped straight into an underwater cave! No wait, determination and a lot of speedy quick reflexes, because without these there is certainly no way you can beat this level. Challenge accepted?

Until now Spidy has never felt so helpless. You have to guide him out of the deepest and darkest depths of the caves; there is no sign of life anywhere! Don’t be miss lead, there is still plenty of danger this far into the earth’s crust, as you are in far less control due to wind tunnels, floating spores and unstable stalactites. You’ll be more than happy to reach the end, if you can?!

name: Alpine Crawler Wild
summary: Alpine Crawler Wild is an Off Road simulation with real-time physics. Featuring 3 game modes (Free Ride, Time Trial, Challenge), 9 cars/trucks, 3 terrains/locations, and 30 exciting and hard levels (10 per country). Plus different weather and day-night conditions (day, night, dawn, rain) as well as visual effects (car-lights, car-colours, dirt). Alpine Crawler Wild has 5 playable drivers (both male and female).

name: Alice VR: Roboto Factory
summary: Get inside the famous Roboto Factory, where all the bots you've met on Speculo were created. Discover its workings and see your old mechanical companions in a new light.

name: Alvora Tactics
summary: Alvora Tactics is an indie Tactics RPG that combines strategic combat with immersive exploration. Explore and conquer Great Serpent Alvora with your own customizable band of warriors!

name: Alianator
summary:
Aliantor is a Defender variant, but instead of side-scrolling in a 3D-environment. Besides the usual alien attack on a space station there is no background story. The player is cast as the only defender of the eight inhabitants and has to prevent them from being kidnapped by the aliens. 
 
Each of the levels can be freely navigated (the ship's speed is automatically throttled when the invisible walls are reached) and the inhabitants stand around on pre-defined places. The aliens have various ship types with different behaviour patterns which either try to destroy the player's ship or collect the inhabitants and bring them into the aliens' invincible station. There they are transformed into especially powerful enemies (mutants). Besides the first-person view on environment, there are some instruments at the bottom of the screen, e.g. a list of present enemy types, a radar, speed, altitude or shield level. The latter represents the life energy and causes death when fully depleted. Additional lives are gained after earning enough points by shooting enemies. Besides dying, another way to lose the game is failing to keep at least one inhabitants alive.

name: Alpha Muse
summary: Alpha Muse is a beautiful, musical playground from Current Circus.

name: Allied General
summary: Imagine that you are an Allied General. You are the commander of the Allied troops in Europe during World War II, and are the best hope of defeating the Axis forces which have captured Europe and North Africa. Use your strategic knowledge in performing daring invasions, paradrops, naval engagements, and fierce aerial combat for control of the skies. Can you lead and command your units through North Africa, Western Europe, Russia, and ultimately to victory? Glory awaits!

name: Alien Arena: Warriors Of Mars - Map Pack 2
summary: Map Pack 2 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: All Must Fall
summary: You fell into a pit and for some reason you can only move with a pole. Can you get out?

name: AlchiMerge: Merge & Craft
summary: AlchiMerge provides a twist to the Merge-genre where you also Craft, Sell and Decorate in your very own Alchemy Shop.

name: All Pro Basketball
summary: Second Tiger Electronics game under the All Pro Basketball title.

name: Alien Havoc
summary: Alien Havoc is a throwback to the classic arcade game genre, putting gamers in command of a little alien who must pluck cows from farms on Earth, load them onto his spaceship, and bring them back to his home planet. The farmers, however, won't let their cows go without a fight. Players must tackle wrapping farm mazes of confusion, play hide and sneak under the cover of tall grass, and throw veggies, rocks, or whatever they can get their alien claws on at the farmers as they fight to bring these valuable livestock back to their home world.

name: Alma the Captive
summary:
Alma the Captive is a short exploration adventure game with a playtime of around 20 to 30 minutes.

Though originally created as a practice in game development, it turned out to be something easily enjoyable, so I’ve decided to release it.

The story has a dark, subdued tone centered around the theme of painting. While it is not intended to provide a horror experience, it does contain mild horror elements. Please be cautious if you are sensitive to such content.

name: Alone
summary: Alone Is a First Person Time Based Survival Game. Lost in the woods of Orah, something is hunting you.

name: Alliance: Heroes of the Spire
summary:
Alliance: Heroes of the Spire

A Hero Collection RPG for iOS and Android.

name: Allied Ambush
summary: Defend your city from the onslaught of the dark army. A game of skill and strategy. Deploy machine gunners, snipers and towers. move your men into towers to increase their shooting range. Three challenging levels to conquer.

name: All Alone: VR
summary: The main goal in All Alone is to find the way out of such forgotten town.

name: Alaric
summary: Boomershooter meets Metroidvania. Fight like hell and defeat the evil king. Explore a giant castle full of secrets.

name: Alien Hell
summary: You have to escape imprisonment from an alien prison whithout having any weapons at your disposal.

name: Alshark
summary:
A young man named Sion Asmarn lives in the town of Cosma on the planet Homu together with his father, a famous explorer. One day, a huge meteorite falls on the planet. Sion's father goes to investigate it together with the physicist Mamon Penrose. Sion and his girlfriend Shoko, Mamon's daughter, venture into the canyon where the meteorite has fallen, only to witness Mamon, apparently possessed by a mysterious force, killing Sion's father and escaping. Determined to get to the bottom of this terrible affair, the two embark on a journey that takes them to different corners of the universe.

Alshark is a Japanese-style sci-fi role-playing game with several distinguishing features. The player controls a party of up to five characters, exploring a vast world consisting of several solar systems, each with its own planets and space stations, many of which can be accessed in any order. Navigation in space is done with the help of the space ship Atlia, which can be equipped with various weapons, engines and frames. From time to time the player will engage in random space combat against enemy ships, earning scrap that can be converted into money. These dogfights are automatic by default, but the player can choose to control the ship and fire its weapons manually, in an arcade shooter style.

The bulk of the exploration, however, takes place on planet surfaces, which the party can explore on foot or in vehicles such as buggies, tanks or hovercrafts. Enemies appear randomly; combat is turn-based and is viewed from the same overhead perspective as the exploration. Only Sion is directly controlled by the player, while other characters follow AI routines, using normal attacks as well as offensive and healing techniques. Characters can equip head and body armor, futuristic melee weapons, as well as a variety of firearms. A "party talk" feature is available, with the characters being able to consult each other at any time. The game is also notable for allowing the characters to level up beyond the customary cap of 100.

The Sega CD version has new anime-style cutscenes and audio music tracks. The PC Engine (TurboGrafx) CD version has a re-worked interface with full-screen navigation, as well as additional cutscenes and voice-overs. It also greatly reduces the amount of random enemy encounters during on-foot exploration, and generally lowers the difficulty level of the game.

name: Alik: Gry i zabawy
summary: Set of didactic games with the friendly dog Alik, which will surely conquer the hearts of all children and become their friend, helper and guide. In different parts of the garden, the child learns to recognize colors and shapes, compare sizes, evaluate the mutual position of objects, count objects and solve simple tasks requiring logical thinking. In some games single skills are practiced, in others - several at once. Alik patiently explains how to do the task, praises the successes and says when the child has made a mistake.

name: Alchemy Unbound
summary: A drag and drop crafting game that offers unbound possibilities. No limits, no direction, just pure creativity and endless crafting.

name: Alek
summary: Post-soviet Russia, Tyumen in 1995. Alexey Smirnov, a local shot-caller, nicknamed 'Alek' found out about the death of his friends and swore to avenge. The bloody war started between the gangs of the city. However, a true enemy turned out not to be common gangsters, but men much scarier

name: Alone Without Her
summary: Sci-Fi Drama Video Game revolving around the story of a man who loses his wife after attempting a new experiment, allowing them to be frozen for 1,000 years!

name: All Cows In
summary: Push the cows in the stable and become Millionaire!

name: Alice with Gatling
summary: This is an exhilarating FPS where you shoot your Gatling Gun and mow down your enemies! Face a horde of monsters as a cute girl "Alice".

name: Alice in Wonderland: Hidden Objects
summary: A great classic fully revised to live a wonderful adventure!

name: Alchemist's Mountain
summary: Alchemist's Mountain is a dungeon solving, adventure platformer rendered in hi-bit pixel art. It tells a heartwarming story of courage and endearing characters, looking to find their place in a world of magic and science.

name: All Things Equal I Would Prefer It If We Were Safe & Lonely Instead of Together & Afraid But I Cannot Deny That It Is Hard; or: A Solitary Spacecraft.
summary: Fictionalized diary of real events.

name: All Cats 'r Belong To Us
summary: In All the cats are belong you will start off your quest with a small band of adventurers aiming to get back your precious cats. By slaying monsters and gathering experience, you will be able to upgrade your adventurers, gain more allies and, maybe, even gain a small foothold in the game world.

name: Alien Typhoon
summary: Galaxian clone for the Apple II.

name: All Songs are From the King
summary: A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

name: Altitude
summary: One large City themed map designed for Vanilla/Chocolate Doom with multiple possible routes and a lot of optionality.

name: Alien Stars
summary: Alien Stars is a scrolling vertical shooter. Players are cast in the role of a lone pilot who must shoot his way through swarms of enemy waves and boss ships over 11 stages. The player's ship can sustain a certain amount of damage, and is protected by both a shield and underlying armor when the shield is depleted. In order to improve firepower, three different colors of power-up can be collected which will improve the indicated type of weapon. Missile power-ups can be collected which will add to the player's ammunition for these secondary weapons. Other power-ups include Life, Shield, Battery restoration, armor restoration, double damage, missile strikes (which fire outward from the player), nuclear weapons and points.

name: Alice In Wonderland: A New Champion
summary: A isometric adventure game set in the world of Tim Burton's Alice in Wonderland.

name: Alchemy Story
summary: Discover a world of magic, cute creatures and adventure in Alchemy Story, a casual farming simulation game! Grow your garden, brew potions, care for your pets and meet new friends!

name: Alternoidz
summary:
Blast your way through space in this action packed arcade-style shooter. 
 
- Survive the onslaught of enemy Aliens and Asteroids. 
- Earn in-game coins to add extra lives and weapon upgrades. 
- Progress through endless waves of space action. 
- The next iteration of the Catacala series with faster action, updated graphics and enhanced Ai.

name: Aladdin Magic Racer
summary: Have you ever dreamed of flying a magic carpet through wild race tracks in the midst of scenery inspired by the most beautiful places in the universe? Then it's time to take the controls!

name: Albert and Camille's Little Lille Adventure
summary: Explore a war-torn city, avoid capture by soldiers, and collect the supplies Albert and Camille need to create the first vaccine to fight tuberculosis. As you progress, you will learn about the methods used to create BCG and how vaccines work.

name: Alien Time Zone
summary: An adventure game.

name: Aladdin
summary: Aladdin is a port of the SNES version of the game of the same name, made by Hummer Team in 1995. The game is one of the more well known pirate ports and is commonly found on multicarts (in its MMC3 hacked form).

name: Alicia Quatermain 3: The Mystery of the Flaming Gold
summary: Alicia Quatermain, a well-known adventurer and adrenaline junkie, is invited by sir Gringray to a charity ball – a common social event where no surprises can happen.

name: Alvara
summary:
Forge your destiny!
Every choice shapes the adventure in this turn-based narrative RPG. Forge strong relationships, influence the story and recruit allies whose power depends on their affections. Craft, potion, explore, dominate. Alvara: Choices and alliances chart your course!

name: Alien Sky
summary: It's not easy to survive under the alien sky when there's always someone to burst you with his weaponry or overcome with his tactics. However you have to. Cause you and your ultramodern space-fighter are the only chance to prevent alien invasion which is almost ready to start, turning your homeworld into ruins.

name: Aladdin
summary: Aladdin is a Famicom port of the Sega Mega Drive game of the same name, made by Super Game and published by Realtec.

name: Alliance: The Silent War
summary: This first person shooter spans 90 years of 20th century conflict and features over 200 small arms from around the world.

name: Alarm for Cobra 11: Hot Pursuit
summary:
Alarm for Cobra 11 Vol. 2: Hot Pursuit is a licensed game about the eponymous German action TV series.

The player solves one mission after another the goal is mostly to chase other drivers down. In the process unlocking special cars and a Making Of about the pilot movie. The courses are based on Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, Munich, Paris, London and New York.

name: Alaskan Road Truckers: Ice Roads
summary: Experience life in the definitive trucker simulator. Deliver cargo to make your business a success. Get out of your truck to explore Alaska while maintaining your vehicle and preparing for treacherous conditions on the road. Have you got what it takes to become an Alaskan trucking legend?

name: Alpha Dog
summary: Will you become the Alpha Dog?You're going to die anyway, so why not do it in style, fighting your way through the Alpha Dog dungeons against hordes of Cur in an attempt to become a legend!

name: All I Want to Do is Dance!
summary: All I Want To Do Is Dance!, also known as Tree Top Token Game, is a simple Flash-based online game, made to promote Pac-Man World 2.

name: All American: The 82nd Airborne in Normandy
summary: A tactical combat simulator featuring the US 82nd Airborne in World War II.

name: Alice and You in the planet of numbers
summary: Walk as many numbers as there are written in the direction you are trying to go. This is a whole new puzzle game based on a very simple idea! Can you achieve 100% and get a donut from King Donut?

name: Alpaca Evolution
summary:
In a sunny merry meadow village, where a herd of alpacas live in peace and innocuously enough. Something unusual has happened. An alpaca was born mutant. He goes on the process of evolution, in his very peculiar way, by knocking out other alpaca brothers, and "absorbing" them.

You will see him no longer a cute and fluffy alpaca. Gained EXP by the "absorbing", he gets much more powerful and bigger… At a final stage of evolution, what could he mutate into? A god or a devil ? or….. It's above and beyond your imagination.

name: Alnahsha Run
summary:
Join the most intense chase through the streets of the city of Riyadh, Cairo, and soon Dubai in the endless runner Alnahsha Run.

Take the runner boy safely through the city, run as fast as possible, dodge the challenging obstacles, use the powerful boosters, jump up or slide down to escape your father, and complete missions to earn coins and increase your multiplier.

name: Aliens and Asteroids
summary: The legendary journalist sets out to investigate an incident that occurred in a laboratory for the study of extraterrestrial technologies. But this trip is not complete without unexpected guests...

name: Alien Decimation
summary: Destroy waves of UFOs in a arcade style space shooter with an array of powerful weaponry.

name: Alien Arena: Map Pack 6
summary: Map Pack 6 for Alien Arena, includes 2 CTF and 2 DM maps.

name: Alien Shooter: The Beginning
summary:
Legendary PC Alien Shooter is now available on your iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!
Deserted military complex. Hordes of merciless creatures. Here you are. Your mission is simple – clear the base so there are just dead monsters' corpses left around.

name: A Little Bird
summary: The A Little Bird contains 50 different puzzles and beautiful illustrations. Break the puzzle and complete the fairy tale book of the princess through dialogue with important characters!

name: Alone
summary: Alone is a horror adventure game. You have to help Yeongchul trapped inside his home, navigate the house to protect himself from suspicious people.

name: A Long Survive
summary: Will you be able to survive? Long Survive is a cooperative shooter in which you'll have to survive waves of enemies. Protect the nexus by fortifying your area with various structures and prepare for the siege. Upgrade your weapons, strategize with your teammates. Survive!

name: All World Pro Wrestling: Bonus Stories 2
summary: Get into those tight trunks and charge into the ring with three more smoking-hot stories of gay wrestling erotica! See the All World Pro Wrestling League at its best: gorgeous men, tight clinches, flexing muscles, and sexual tension in every move.

name: Aliants
summary: A sci-fi themed action/strategy game.

name: Alien Invasion 3d
summary: In this game you have to be fast and precise . Enemy planes are on your tail all the time .

name: All in Casino Girls: Extended Edition
summary: Hit jackpots and increase your prestige to unlock new games. Get the ladies' attention, and eventually make it to the top of the millionaire list!

name: Alpha Centauri Space Force
summary: Execute intense space battle operations from side, and top view. Face tough enemies along your way, destroy guardians and generators. Dodge traps. Keep focus on targets. Think fast. Overcome the chaos. Join now and become an alpha centauri pilot. Bonus: retro like endless space shooter mini game.

name: Aleph
summary: Aleph is a cube that stores human information and anthropomorphic images, starting from the space station and eventually arriving at the ruins of the dilapidated city, looking for the cube scattered everywhere and digging up the information in it...

name: Albatross Koukairoku
summary: Aboard the Albatross is an odd captain and an equally crazy crew. With no map in hand, they sail to unknown islands, meet ghost ships and cross paths with giant monster fish. No one knows where they are heading… including the captain. But they still all stay together since there’s no other place for them.

name: Alpha Collexion
summary: Alpha Collexion offers 26 minigames in an "advent calendar" motif, encouraging players to play one new game a day.

name: Alice: Asylum
summary:
The game was in development while the developer attempted to get/license the rights to the series from EA, who published the previous games, so they could complete it independently.

However, EA officially rejected the project in 2023, refusing both to fund the game and to license the IP, stating that "Alice" is an important part of EA's overall game catalog. The project is now cancelled with no possibility of continuation.

name: Aldora
summary: You've left your home island for the vast continent of Arronia. Starting with nothing, gather resources, craft, and build your home, or explore new lands. Can you thrive and make a name for yourself in this world?

name: Alley Rally
summary: Car racing through crazy traffic.

name: Alveari
summary: A collection of VR mini-games! Slow motion action!

name: All Humans Must Die!
summary: Try to kill as many humans as possible...in 60 seconds!

name: Alphaputt
summary: Alphaputt is that beautiful place where typography meets crazy golf. Putt your way through the alphabet, complete your own wordy courses and challenge your friends. Just watch out for the UFOs. And the vacuum cleaners.

name: Alterworld
summary: Explore the infinite world! Play with the fully destructible voxel terrain! Craft and split items! Build and customize a house or any building! And many more! This is the ultimate sandbox survival game where you can do almost anything you can dream!

name: Alien War Girl
summary: The game is named "Valkyrie ", and it tells a story of the heroine's struggle against alien invasion of Earth. Our beautiful heroine will fight aginst oppression to win her freedom and take revenge on her father.

name: Alley Nine
summary: You are trapped in an endless alleyway late at night. Observe anomalies or differences in the surrounding environment carefully, and finally reach "Alley Nine".

name: Alexandra Ledermann 2: Equitation Competition
summary: A horse raising and stable riding sim, with design input from France's well-known professional champion rider, Alexandra Ledermann.

name: Aliens in the Yard
summary: The aliens have decided to steal the Earth's most precious artifacts: your backyard junk. Defend your backyard with fireworks!

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Endeavor Veteran Pack
summary: Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with a pack of over 20 items, including class kit skins, a custom shotgun, weapon colors, head accessories, emotes and more!

name: Alien Scumbags
summary: Alien Scumbags is a sci-fi action platformer with a big slice of horror and a stack of pop culture references. You'll run, hide and kill across several levels, collect items from capsule machines and unlock characters.
